But avoid profane foolish babblings, for they will increase to more ungodliness|Stie faar fram aagiment we no rispek Gad. Kaaz di piipl dem we get iina dem kain-a aagiment de wi staat jraa we fram im.
and their word will spread like gangrene: Among them are Hymenaeus and Philetus
column2: Fi dem mesij a-go pred laik gyanggriin. Aimeniyos an Filiitos a tuu a dem kain-a piipl de.

column1: who have erred concerning the truth, saying that the resurrection has already occurred, and who overthrow the faith of some.|Dem a tiich sopm we faar fram di chuut. Dem a se ou Gad piipl ded an kom bak aredi, an a kaaz som piipl fi tap biliiv iina Jiizas Krais.

But the firm foundation of God stands, having this seal, “The Lord knows those who are His,” and, “Let everyone who calls on the name of Christ depart from iniquity.”|Bot Gad foundieshan salid an chrang, it a tan op siem wie. An it av dis rait pan it: “Di Laad nuo di piipl dem we a fi im uon,” an “Enibadi we se Jiizas a ‘Laad’ mos tap du wikid sitn.”

In a large house there are not only gold and silver vessels, but also those of wood and clay; some are for honor, and some for dishonor.|Iina wan griet ous yu av nof difrant kain-a boul. Yu av guol boul an silva boul, boul we mek outa wud, boul we mek outa klie, boul we yu yuuz fi speshal taim an boul we yu yuuz evridie.

One who cleanses himself from these things will be a vessel for honor, sanctified, fit for the Master’s use, and prepared for every good work.|A siem wie it go wid piipl. Ef enibadi wi kliin op demself an ton fram aal we wikid, im wi komiin laik wan a di speshal boul dem. An Gad wi kyan yuuz im fi du speshal tingz. Im wi redi fi du aal kain-a gud sopm.

So flee youthful desires and pursue righteousness, faith, love, and peace, with those who call on the Lord out of a pure heart. |So ron we fram di wikid sitn dem we di yong piipl dem waahn fi du an chrai aad aad fi du we rait. Yu mos liv ou Gad waahn yu fi liv an yu fi shuo lov an tek taim wid ada piipl. Chos iina Jiizas an no gi op. Timoti dis a wa yu fi du. An aal a di piipl dem we worship Gad wid wan kliin aat fi du it tu.

But avoid foolish and unlearned debates, knowing that they create strife.|No av notn fi du wid no fuul-fuul ar chupid aagiment an no bada kos-kos wid nobadi uova Gad wod, kaaz yu nuo se dem sitn de onggl kaaz piipl fi fait.

The servant of the Lord must not quarrel, but must be gentle toward all people, able to teach, patient|An Jiizas Krais sorvant dem no fi fait; dem fi kain tu evribadi. Dem fi kyan tiich gud an wen dem a diil wid piipl dem fi tek dem taim wid dem.

in gentleness instructing those in opposition. Perhaps God will grant them repentance to know the truth|Gad sorvant, wen im a karek di wan dem we go gens di chuut, fi tek im taim wid dem. Kaaz Gad mait-a mek dem chienj dem wiez an lorn di chuut.

and they may escape from the snare of the devil, after being captured by him to do his will.|An dem mait-a get sens an si se di devl chrap dem an kyan get outa it. Di devl did chrap dem so im kuda yuuz dem fi du im wok.
Know this: In the last days perilous times will come.|Bot nuo dis, iina di laas die dem tingz a-go get aad aad.

Men will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy|Piipl onggl a-go bizniz wid demself an dem a-go lov moni. Dem a-go gwaan buosi-buosi an ful-a demself. Dem a-go kos out an biit op biit op dem wan aneda an dem naa go fala wa dem mada an faada se. Piipl naa go gi tangks fi notn an dem naa go av notn fi du wid Gad.

without natural affection, trucebreakers, slanderers, unrestrained, fierce, despisers of those who are good|Dem naa go lov dem wan aneda ar notn we gud. Dem a-go taak bad bout dem wan aneda tu. Iina di laas die dem, piipl naa go av no kanchuol uova demself an dem a-go gwaan laik dem a wail daag.

traitors, reckless, conceited, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God|Dem a-go ton chrieta an dem a-go du bie kielis sitn. Piipl iina di laas die dem a-go gwaan laik dem beta dan evribadi els. Insted-a lov Gad dem a-go lov fi du di sitn dem we dem tingk a fon, iivn ef Gad se dem no fi du dem.

having a form of godliness, but denying its power. Turn away from such people.|Dem a-go gwaan laik se dem a Gad piipl bot dem naa go riili biliiv iina Gad. Yu si dem piipl ya, no av notn fi du wid dem.
Those of this nature creep into houses and captivate silly women who are burdened with sins and led away with various desires
column2: Dem de piipl de wi wok dem wie iina piipl fambili an fuul op di uman dem we iizi fi chrik an we a liv iina aal kain-a sin an kyaahn kanchuol demself.

column1: always learning, but never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.|Dem uman ya eva waahn lorn bot kyan neva si di chuut.

Now as Jannes and Jambres resisted Moses, so these also resist the truth, men of corrupt minds and worthless concerning the faith.|Siem wie Janis an Jambres did go gens Muoziz, a siem wie dem man ya go gens di chuut. Dem faalz tiicha ya, dem main mes op an dem naa tingk chriet. Dem man ya a fiek, dem a no riili Gad piipl.
But they shall proceed no further, for their folly will be revealed to everyone, as theirs also was.|Bot dem naa go get faar kaaz jos laik Janis an Jambres, piipl a-go si se dem a taak fuulinish.

But you have observed my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, tolerance, love, patience|Bot yu Timoti, yu fala wa mi tiich an yu fi liv yu laif laik ou mi liv fi mi laif. Yu nuo wa mi waahn fi du an wa mi biliiv iina. Yu si ou mi lov piipl an ou mi put op wid chobl an neva tap no mata wa.

persecutions, and afflictions, which came to me at Antioch, Iconium, and Lystra—what persecutions I endured! But the Lord delivered me out of them all. |Yu nuo bout aal a di sitn dem mi did afi go chuu an ou mi did sofa iina Antiyak, Aikoniyom an Lischra. Mi go chuu aal a dem sitn de an Gad bring mi chuu di uol a dem.
Yes, and all who desire to live a godly life in Christ Jesus will suffer persecution. |Az a matarafak, enibadi we se dem a Gad piipl an a fala Gad, afi go chogl chuu nof sitn tu.

But evil men and seducers will grow worse and worse, deceiving and being deceived.|Bot di wikid piipl dem an di fraad dem a-go get fram bad tu wos. Dem a-go gwaan chrik piipl an lou demself fi get chrik tu.

But continue in the things that you have learned and have been assured of, knowing those from whom you have learned them|Bot yu si yu Timoti, gwaan uol aan tait tait pan wa yu lorn an wa yu biliiv iina kaaz yu nuo a uu tiich yu.

and that since childhood you have known the Holy Scriptures, which are able to make you wise unto salvation through the faith that is in Christ Jesus.|Fram yu a likl pikni yu nuo Gad wod we kuda mek yu waiz inof fi biliiv iina Jiizas Krais an mek im siev yu.

All Scripture is inspired by God and is profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for instruction in righteousness|Evri wod we iina Gad wod kom fram Gad. An da Wod de gud fi tiich piipl an fi put piipl iina dem plies wen dem staat se tingz we no iina Gad wod. It gud fi karek piipl an fi tiich dem ou fi liv rait.
that the man of God may be complete, thoroughly equipped for every good work.|Gad wod wi mek im sorvant dem redi an wi mek dem kyan du aal kain-a gud sitn.

I charge you therefore before God and the Lord Jesus Christ, who will judge the living and the dead at His appearing and His kingdom: |Wen Jiizas di King kom bak fi ruul, im a-go joj di piipl dem we a liv an di piipl dem we ded. So infronta Gad an Jiizas Krais, mi a beg yu

Preach the word, be ready in season and out of season, reprove, rebuke, and exhort, with all patience and teaching.|priich Gad wod an mek shuor se yu aalwiez redi fi priich. Ef di taim rait ar it no rait, priich it siem wie. Yu afi shuo di piipl dem di rang we dem a du an put dem iina dem plies kaaz dem a sin. Yu mos tek taim wid dem wen yu a tiich dem an push dem fi du wa rait.

For the time will come when people will not endure sound doctrine, but they will gather to themselves teachers in accordance with their own desires, having itching ears|Kaaz wan taim a-go kom wen piipl naa go put op wid ar lisn tu wa Gad piipl a tiich. Insted-a dat, fi mek demself api, dem a-go luk fi di tiicha dem we wi tel dem wa dem waahn fi ier, kaaz dem lov ier nyuu sitn.
and they will turn their ears away from the truth and turn to myths.
column2: An dem a-go ton dem bak pan di chuut an staat lisn tu di tuori dem we a no chuu.

column1: But be self-controlled in all things, endure afflictions, do the work of an evangelist, and prove your ministry.|Bot yu si yu Timoti, yu afi kanchuol yuself iina evriting. Yu a-go fies nof chobl bot yu mos push chuu it an gwaan priich Gad wod. An kaaz yu a Gad sorvant yu mos du aal di wok we im gi yu fi du.

For I am already being poured out as a drink offering, and the time of my departure has come. |Kaaz jos laik wen dem puor out wain wen dem don bon sakrifais, a siem so mi laif an di wok we mi a du fi Gad suun don.

I have fought a good fight, I have finished my course, and I have kept the faith. |Mi wok aad fi Gad; mi fait fi wa mi biliiv iina. Mi priich Gad wod an du aal a wa Gad tel mi fi du; mi ron da ries ya til it don an no gi op. Mi a-go sorv im til mi ded.

From now on a crown of righteousness is laid up for me, which the Lord, the righteous Judge, will give me on that Day, and not only to me but also to all who have loved His appearing.|Di Laad we aalwiez fier tu evribadi wen im a joj dem, a-go gi mi wan kroun fi aal a di wok we mi du. Im a-go gi mi it wen im kom bak fi joj di worl. An a no mi wan a-go get kroun, im a-go gi evribadi we did a lang fi im kom bak.
Diligently try to come to me soon.
column2: Du yu bes an mikies kom si mi.

column1: Demas has forsaken me, having loved this present world, and has departed to Thessalonica, Crescens to Galatia, and Titus to Dalmatia.|Kaaz Diimas gaan lef mi an gaan dong a Tesalonaika, kaaz im lov da worl ya. Kresens gaan a Gyaliesha an Taitos gaan a Dalmatiya.

Only Luke is with me. Get Mark, and bring him with you, for he is profitable to me for the ministry. |A onggl Luuk de ya wid mi. Wen yu a kom, go get Maak an bring im wid yu. Kaaz im kyan elp mi nof nof wen mi a priich an tiich Gad wod.
I sent Tychicus to Ephesus.
column2: Nou mi sen Taikikos gaan a Efisos.

column1: When you come, bring with you the cloak that I left at Troas with Carpus, and the books, but especially the parchments.|Wen yu a kom, kyari di kuot we mi did lef wid Kyaapos iina Chuowas. An bring mi ruol op buk dem, speshali di wan dem we mek outa animal skin.
Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil. May the Lord reward him according to his works. \|Aligzanda, di wan we wok wid metal, du nof wikid sitn tu mi. Gad a-go pie im bak fi aal we im du.
Beware of him, for he has greatly opposed our words.|Yu mos wach out fi im, kaaz im a go gens wa wi tiich aad aad.

At my first defense no one stood with me, but everyone forsook me. May it not be charged against them.|Wen mi did go a kuot fi di fos taim fi chrai difen miself nobadi neva kom sopuot mi, di uol a dem lef mi fi fen fi miself. Mi uop Gad no uol it gens dem.

But the Lord stood with me and strengthened me, so that through me the preaching might be fully known, and that all the Gentiles might hear. And I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.|Bot di Laad did tan op saida mi an gi mi chrent. Im gi mi chrent so dat mi kuda priich di uol a im mesij tu di piipl dem we a no Juu. An im siev mi fram di piipl dem we did waahn fi fling mi gi di laiyan dem.

The Lord will deliver me from every evil work and will preserve me for His heavenly kingdom, to whom be glory forever and ever. Amen.|Di Laad naa go mek no wikid sitn ort mi. Im a-go kip mi sief an kyari mi go a im uom iina evn. Priez im fi eva an eva! Iemen!
Greet Priscilla and Aquila and the household of Onesiphorus.
column2: Tel Prisila an Akwila an evribadi we liv iina Onisiforos yaad oudi fi mi.

column1: Erastus remained at Corinth, and I have left Trophimus ill in Miletus.|Irastos did stie iina Korint an mi lef Chrofimos iina Miletos chuu im did sik.

Diligently try to come before winter. Eubulus greets you, and so do Pudens, Linus, Claudia, and all the brothers.|Timoti, du yu bes fi kom ya bifuo winta. Yuubolos, Pyuudens, Lainos, Klaadiya an di uol a di breda dem sen oudi fi yu.
The Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Grace be with you. Amen.
column2: Mi prie se Gad wi tan wid yu an dat im wi shuo yu lov iivn duo wi no dizorv it.

column1: Paul, Silas, and Timothy,To the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ:Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.|Dis a Paal. A mi, Silvanos an Timoti a rait da leta ya. Wi a rait unu — aal a di piipl dem we de a Tesalonaika we biliiv iina Jiizas Krais, aal a uu a Gad an Krais Jiizas piipl dem: Mi prie se Gad wi aalwiez shuo unu im lov iivn duo wi no dizorv it an mek unu av piis iina unu aat.
We give thanks to God always for you all, mentioning you in our prayers|Wi eva a gi Gad tangks fi di uol a unu an a prie fi unu.

remembering without ceasing your work of faith, labor of love, and patient hope in our Lord Jesus Christ in the sight of God and our Father.|Wi no tap prie an gi Faada Gad tangks fi unu kaaz wi memba ou unu du som gud sitn kaaz unu biliiv iina Jiizas. Wi memba ou unu wok wel aad kaaz unu lov im; an wi tingk bout ou unu neva eva tap luk tu im, an so unu kuda pres aan no mata wa.
For we know, beloved brothers, your election by God.|Breda an sista we Gad lov, wi nuo se Gad pik unu fi imself.

For our gospel did not come to you in word only, but also in power, and in the Holy Spirit, and in much assurance, just as you know what kind of men we were among you for your sake.|Kaaz wen wi did bring wi Gud Nyuuz kom, a neehn suo-so wod wi bring kom, bot wi bring di mesij wid powa we kom fram di Uoli Spirit. An unu si se wi biliiv wid aal a wi aat se di Gud Nyuuz a chuu. Unu si aal a wa wi did du wen wi did liv mongks unu? Wi did du aal a dem sitn de fi elp unu.

You became followers of us and the Lord, having received the word in much affliction, with joy of the Holy Spirit. |Unu staat fala wi — an staat fala di Laad tu. An duo unu sofa bad bad unu biliiv iina di Gud Nyuuz siem wie no mata di sofarieshan, kaaz di Uoli Spirit mek unu wel api.
Therefore you were examples to all who believe in Macedonia and Achaia.|An chuu dat, unu ton di kain-a piipl we aal a di piipl dem we biliiv iina Gad, we de iina Masiduoniya an Akaiya, kyan fala.

For the word of the Lord sounded out from you not only in Macedonia and Achaia, but also in every place your faith in God has gone forth, so that we do not need to say anything.|An siek-a wa unu a du, aal piipl we no de iina Masiduoniya an Akaiya ier di Gud Nyuuz. Piipl aal bout a ier ou unu chos iina Gad — so wi no afi bada se notn tu dem

For they themselves declare how we were received by you, and how you turned to God from idols, to serve the living and true God|kaaz dem siem wan taak bout ou unu chriit wi gud wen wi did kom wich paat unu de. Dem taak bout ou unu ton we fram unu faalz gad dem, fi kom sorv Gad — di riil Gad we no ded an we gi laif.

and to wait for His Son from heaven, whom He raised from the dead—Jesus, who delivered us from the wrath to come.|An dem taak bout ou unu a wiet fi Jiizas, Gad Bwai Pikni, fi kom fram evn. Jiizas, we Gad mek kom bak alaiv. Jiizas, we siev wi fram Gad jojment we a kom.
You yourselves know, brothers, that our visit to you was not in vain.|Breda an sista, unu nuo fi unuself se wen wi did kom tu unu, nobadi kudn se wi kom fi notn.

But even after we had previously suffered and were shamefully treated at Philippi, as you know, we were bold in our God to declare to you the gospel of God amid much opposition.|Unu nuo ou wen wi did de a Filipai di piipl dem we inchaaj did mek wi sofa. Dem shiem wi bad bot Gad gi wi di chrent fi kom tu unu siem wie an kom tel unu di Gud Nyuuz, iivn duo uol iip a piipl did a chrai fi tap wi

For our exhortation was not from deceit, nor from uncleanness, nor in guile.|di mesij we wi bring kom gi unu neva kom fram no lai. Wi neehn tel unu fi di rang riizn, an wi neehn a chrai fi chrik unu niida.

But as we were allowed by God to be entrusted with the gospel, even so we speak, not to please men, but God, who examines our hearts.|Insted-a dem sitn de, wa wi did du? Wi taak laik man we Gad tes an tingk gud inof fi sen wid di mesij bout Jiizas. Wi naa chrai fi mek nobadi laik wi, wi onggl waahn du wa Gad waahn wi fi du kaaz a im a si wi aat.

For neither at any time did we come with flattering words, as you know, nor with a pretext for greed. God is our witness.|An unu nuo se wi neehn kom swiit-mout non a unu no taim at aal, an Gad si an nuo se wi neehn a chrai yuuz notn we wi se fi tek advaantij a non a unu niida.

Nor did we seek glory from men, either from you, or from others, even though we might have made demands as the apostles of Christ.|Wi neehn a luk fi piipl big wi op ar notn laka dat. Wi neva did a luk fi dat fram non a unu ar fram nobadi els niida.

But we were gentle among you, like a nurse caring for her own children. |An kaaz wi a apasl fi Krais Jiizas, wi kuda kom bordn unu dong, bot insted-a dat, wi chriit unu jengkl wen wi did de de, siem laik wen mada we av yong biebi a tek kier a ar likl pikni dem.

So having great love toward you, we were willing to impart to you not only the gospel of God but also our own lives, because you were dear to us. |Wi lov unu so moch dat wi neva did onggl waahn unu nuo bout di Gud Nyuuz, bot wi did glad fi du eniting wi kuda du fi elp unu tu — kaaz unu miin so moch tu wi.

For you remember, brothers, our labor and toil. Laboring night and day so as not to be an expense to any of you, we preached to you the gospel of God.|Breda an sista, wi shuor se unu memba ou aad wi did afi wok. Wi wok die an nait so wi neehn afi presha nobadi ar bordn unu dong wen wi did kom priich tu unu di Gud Nyuuz we kom fram Gad.

You and God are witnesses of how pure, upright, and blameless we ourselves behaved among you who believe.|Unu siem wan si an nuo, an Gad si an nuo tu se wen wi did de mongks unu we biliiv, wi neehn du notn rang. Wi du di rait sitn dem an nobadi kudn bliem wi fi notn.
As you know, we exhorted, comforted, and commanded every one of you, as a father does his own children|An unu nuo se wi diil wid evri wan a unu laik ou wan faada chriit im uona pikni dem.

that you would walk in a manner worthy of God, who has called you to His kingdom and glory.|Wi gi unu gud wod, wi gi unu chrent an wi kip aan a beg unu fi liv laik Gad piipl. Kaaz a im kaal unu iina fi im kindom an kaal unu fi kom nuo ou big an powaful im bi.

For this reason we thank God without ceasing because, when you received the word of God, which you heard from us, you received it not as the word of men, but as it truly is, the word of God, which effectively works also in you who believe. |An siek-a dis wi gi Gad tangks aal di wail. Kaaz wen unu tek iin Gad wod we unu did ier fram wi, unu neehn tek it laik a wod we kom fram man, bot unu tek it fi wa it bi fi chuu — Gad wod, we a wok iina aal a unu we biliiv.

For you, brothers, became followers of the churches of God, which in Judea are in Christ Jesus. You also have suffered the same things from your own countrymen, as they have from the Jews|Breda an sista, unu komiin jos laik Gad choch dem iina Krais Jiizas, we de a Judiya. Kaaz a fi unu uona piipl dem, we de wich paat unu de, a mek unu sofa di siem wie ou di Judiyan piipl dem mek dem we de a Judiya sofa.
who both killed the Lord Jesus and their own prophets and have persecuted us. They do not please God and are contrary to all men
column2: A dem siem Judiyan piipl de kil aaf di Laad Jiizas; dem did kil di prafit dem tu. An den dem kom kom mek wi sofa. Dem mek Gad beks bad! An dem an nobadi a no fren!

column1: forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved. In this way they are always piling up their sins, but wrath has come upon them to the extreme.|An aal wen wi fi taak tu di piipl dem we a no Juu so dem kyan get siev, di Judiyan piipl dem did chrai fi no mek wi taak tu dem. Bot dem eva a sin a galang so til dem bok, so Gad kech op wid dem nou an a joj dem aad aad.

But we, brothers, being taken from you for a short time, in presence, not in heart, endeavored all the more abundantly to see your face with great desire.|Breda an sista, mek wi taak bout wi nou. Wen dem mek wi afi lef unu, aal ef a did jos wan owa, bwai wi mis unu! Wi mait-a kyaahn si unu bot wi did a tingk bout unu siem wie, an chrai aad aad fi si unu.
Therefore we wished to come to you—even I, Paul, once and again—but Satan hindered us.|So, wi did waahn fi kom tu unu. Mi fi wan — Paal, mi chrai uova an uova bot Sietan blak wi.

For what is our hope, or joy, or crown of rejoicing? Will it not even be you in the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ at His coming?|Mi did waahn kom luk fi unu. Kaaz aftaraal, a uu mek wi kyan luk faawod fi di die wen wi Laad kom bak, kaaz wi nuo fi shuor se unu a-go gwaan biliiv iina im. An a uu mek wi api so? Ar uu mek wi a-go kyan buos infronta im wen im kom bak, buos laik se wi win medal? iihn? No unu!
You are our glory and joy.|Kaaz fi riil man, a unu mek wi proud an api so!
Therefore, when we could no longer endure it, we thought it good to be left at Athens alone. |So, wen wi kudn bier it no langga, wi did api fi tan iina Atenz — wi wan.

We sent Timothy, who is our brother and minister of God and our fellow laborer in the gospel of Christ, to establish and comfort you with regard to your faith|An wi sen Timoti tu unu. Timoti wi breda, we a wok wid Gad an a priich di Gud Nyuuz bout Krais Jiizas. Wi sen im fi bil unu op iina wa unu biliiv, an fi mek unu kyan uol aan
so that no one would be shaken by these afflictions. For you know that we are appointed to this.
column2: so dem sofarieshan ya kyaahn shiek op non a unu. Kaaz unu siem wan nuo se a dat Gad plan fi wi.

column1: Indeed, we told you before when we were with you that we would suffer tribulation, just as it came to pass, as you well know.|Memba wen wi did de wich paat unu de, wi did waan unu lang bifuo it apm se wi did a go sofa? An si de — a dat apm! Unu don nuo dat aredi.

For this reason, when I could no longer endure it, I sent to inquire about your faith, lest by some means the tempter might have tempted you, and our labor might have been in vain.|A so kom wen wi kudn bier it no langga mi did afi sen Timoti fi fain out ef unu a uol aan chrang an a gwaan chos iina Gad. Kaa mi did fried se Sietan did mek unu du rang an so aal di wok we wi did du mongks unu wudn wot notn.

But just now Timothy has come from you to us and brought us good news of your faith and love, and that you always have good memories of us, desiring greatly to see us, as we also desire to see you.|Bot nou Timoti kom bak kom gi wi gud nyuuz bout ou unu stil biliiv iina Jiizas chrang chrang an ou unu lov Gad tu. Im tel wi se unu eva a tingk bout wi iina som gud wie, an ou unu lang fi si wi jos laik ou wi lang fi si unu.

Therefore, brothers, during all our afflictions and distress, we have been encouraged about you through your faith.|So breda an sista, iivn duo wi de ya an a go chuu wi uona chobl an sofarieshan, wi fiil gud iina wi aat, kaaz unu tan op chrang iina Gad an a gwaan chos iina im siem wie.
For now we live, if you stand strong in the Lord.|An nou wi riili a liv sins wi nuo se unu a tan op chrang iina Gad.
For what thanks can we render to God for you, for all the joy with which we rejoice for your sakes before our God|Wi kyaahn tangk Gad inof fi unu, an fi ou api unu mek wi fiil wen wi go bifuo Gad.

night and day praying earnestly that we might see your face and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith?|Nait an die wi prie aad aad fi unu, a aks Gad fi mek wi si unu agen, so wi kyan gi unu wat-eva unu niid fi chos im iina evri wie, laik wa unu sopuoz fi a du.
Now may our God and Father Himself, and our Lord Jesus Christ, direct our way to you.|Nou wi prie se Faada Gad imself an wi Laad Jiizas wi mek wi kyan kom luk fi unu.

And may the Lord make you increase and abound in love for one another and for all men, even as we do for you. |An wi prie se di Laad Jiizas wi elp unu fi lov unu wan aneda muo an muo an ada piipl tu, so unu wi lov piipl di siem wie ou wi lov unu.

To this end may He establish your hearts to be blameless in holiness before our God and Father at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all His saints.|Da wie ya, unu aat wi get chrang so unu wi du di sitn dem we shuo se unu bilang tu wi Faada Gad. An so im naa go kyan bliem unu fi notn wen unu tan op infronta im wen wi Laad Jiizas kom bak wid aal a im piipl dem.

Finally, brothers, we urge and exhort you by the Lord Jesus, that as you have learned from us how you ought to walk and to please God, you should excel more and more.|Nou, breda an sista, fi don wa wi did a se bifuo: wi did don tiich unu aredi ou fi liv so Gad wi api wid unu (an wi nuo se a so unu a liv). Bot, wi a aks unu, an a beg unu iina di Laad Jiizas niem fi liv so muo an muo.
For you know what commands we gave you through the Lord Jesus.|Kaaz unu nuo se wa wi tel unu fi du, a dat di Laad Jiizas se unu fi du.

For this is the will of God, your sanctification: that you should abstain from sexual immorality|Gad waahn unu fi liv wan laif we gud an kliin an we shuo se unu a fi im uona piipl, so unu fi kip we fram aal kain-a seks sin.

that each one of you should know how to possess his own vessel in sanctification and honor|Evri wan a unu fi nuo ou fi kanchuol unu badi iina wan wie we gud an kliin an we shuo se unu a Gad piipl, an iina wan wie we piipl kyan rispek.
not in the lust of depravity, even as the Gentiles who do not know God|Unu no fi go roun an a dabl-dabl iina seks sin laik di worliyan dem we no nuo Gad.

and that no man take advantage of and defraud his brother in any matter, because the Lord is the avenger in all these things, as we also have forewarned you and testified.|An unu mosn chriit unu breda an sista dem iina wan wie we no rait. Unu no fi tek advaantij a dem. Kaaz di Laad a-go ponish piipl fi aal a dem kain-a sin ya. Wi did don tel unu an waan unu aredi.
For God has not called us to uncleanness, but to holiness.|Kaaz Gad neehn kaal wi fi wi dabl iina seks sin, bot fi liv kliin.

Therefore he that despises does not despise man, but God, who has also given us His Holy Spirit.|An enibadi we no du dis, a no jos man dem naa fala bot dem ton dem bak pan Gad — Gad, we gi unu im Uoli Spirit.

As concerning brotherly love, you do not need me to write to you. For you yourselves are taught by God to love one another.|Nou fi taak bout ou unu fi lov unu breda an sista dem we biliiv iina Jiizas, mi no niid fi rait an tel unu bout dat, kaaz Gad imself don tiich unu ou fi lov unu wan aneda.

And indeed, you do have love for all the brothers who are in all Macedonia. But we urge you, brothers, that you increase more and more.|An fi riil unu lov unu breda an sista dem we de aal uova Masiduoniya. Bot mi breda an sista, wi a beg unu du dat muo an muo.

Learn to be calm, and to conduct your own business, and to work with your own hands, as we commanded you|Unu fi chrai aad fi liv wan kwaiyat laif an no go roun wid no loud naiz a aagyu-aagyu. Unu fi main unu uona bizniz an no megl-megl. An unu fi wok wid unu an, jos laka ou wi tel unu fi du.

so that you may walk honestly toward those who are outsiders and that you may lack nothing.|Da wie de, ou unu liv wi mek piipl we no biliiv an chos iina Gad rispek unu an unu no afi luk tu nobadi fi notn niida.

But I would not have you ignorant, brothers, concerning those who are asleep, that you may not grieve as others who have no hope.|Breda an sista, wi waahn unu fi nuo bout wa riili apm tu aal a dem we jrap asliip. Da wie ya unu wi no baal an muon laik di piipl dem we no nuo Gad an no ekspek notn gud fi apm afta sumadi ded.

For if we believe that Jesus died and arose again, so God will bring with Him those who sleep in Jesus. |Wi biliiv se Jiizas ded an kom bak alaiv, so wi biliiv se Gad a-go mek evribadi we chos iina Jiizas kom bak alaiv wen Jiizas kom bak.

For this we say to you by the word of the Lord, that we who are alive and remain until the coming of the Lord will not precede those who are asleep. |Wa wi a tiich unu ya nou a wa di Laad wod se. Wi we stil alaiv, wen di Laad kom bak wi naa go miit op wid di Laad bifuo dem we ded aredi yu no.

For the Lord Himself will descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trumpet call of God. And the dead in Christ will rise first.|Kaaz di Laad imself a-go kom dong fram outa evn, an piipl a-go ier im baal out loud. Dem a-go ier di ed ienjel kaal out an Gad chompit a-go bluo. An di piipl dem we ded we did biliiv iina Krais Jiizas, dem a-go kom bak alaiv fos.

Then we who are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds to meet the Lord in the air. And so we shall be forever with the Lord.|Den wi we stil a liv, an we de pan ort siem wie, wi an dem a-go get tek op iina di kloud dem fi miit di Laad iina di ier an a so wi a-go en op de wich paat di Laad de fi eva.
Therefore comfort one another with these words.|So, yuuz dem wod ya elp unu wan aneda, so unu aat wi no evi dong.
Concerning the times and the seasons, brothers, you have no need that I write to you.|Breda an sista, mi no afi rait unu bout di taim an di die wen dem sitn de a-go apm.
For you know perfectly that the day of the Lord will come like a thief in the night.|Kaaz unu don nuo se di die wen di Laad a kom bak a-go kom iin sodn, jos laik wan tiif iina di nait.

When they say, “Peace and safety!” then sudden destruction will come upon them as labor upon a woman with child, and they shall not escape.|Wen piipl staat fi se wi av piis an evriting sief, braps — a dat de taim tingz a-go ton opsaid dong. Sofarieshan a-go lik dem so faas laik wen pien staat riich di uman we bout fi av biebi. An dem naa go kyan ron we fram it.
But you, brothers, are not in darkness so that this Day should overtake you as a thief.|Bot, breda an sista, unu nuo tu moch fi di die wen di Laad kom, kom fraitn unu laik tiif iina nait.
You are all the sons of light and the sons of the day. We are not of the night nor of darkness.
column2: Kaaz di uol a unu bilang tu di lait an unu bilang tu di die. Wi no av notn fi du wid nait an daaknis.

column1: Therefore let us not sleep as others do. But let us be alert and sober.
column2: So mek wi no sliip laik dem we a liv iina di daak. Bot mek wi kip wi yai waid uopm an wi ed skruu aan gud.

column1: For those who sleep, sleep at night, and those who get drunk, are drunk at night.|Kaaz aal uu sliip — sliip a nait taim. An dem de we jongk aaf demself — a nait taim dem get jongk.

But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love, and as a helmet, the hope of salvation.|Bot wi we bilang tu di die, wi fi tingk chriet an chos iina Gad an lov im. Da wie de wi a protek wiself jos laik di suoja dem wen dem wier di metal ves. An jos laik ou di suoja dem put aan di elmit fi protek dem ed, a siem so wi fi protek wiself an luk faawod fi Gad siev wi, an biliiv iina wi aat se im a-go du it.
For God has not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ|Kaaz Gad neehn put wi ya, so im kuda mek wi sofa, bot im du wa im du so di Laad Jiizas Krais kuda siev wi.
who died for us, so that whether we are awake or asleep, we should live together with Him.|Jiizas ded fi wi, so weda wi alaiv ar wi ded di uol a wi kyan go liv wid im.
So comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, just as you are doing.|So unu fi taak di sitn dem fi elp unu wan aneda get chrang, laik wa unu a du nou, an gwaan bil op unu wan aneda.

We ask you, brothers, to acknowledge those who labor among you, and are appointed over you in the Lord, and instruct you.|Breda an sista, nou wi a beg unu fi rispek di piipl dem we a wok aad mongks unu, an we a liid an tiich unu.
Esteem them very highly in love for their work’s sake. And be at peace among yourselves.
column2: Unu fi gi dem nof rispek an shuo dem ou unu tingk dem impuotant. Unu fi lov dem siek-a aal we dem du. Liv iina piis mongks unu wan aneda.

column1: Now we exhort you, brothers, warn those who are unruly, comfort the faint-hearted, support the weak, and be patient toward everyone.|Unu lisn tu we mi av fi tel un, breda, waan di wan dem we naav no bievya, bring komfat tu friedi-friedi peepl, sopuot peepl we week an tek taim wid evribadi.

See that no one renders evil for evil to anyone. But always seek to do good to one another and to all.|An breda an sista, wi beg unu fi waan di aiglaz dem we no waahn wok; elp di wan dem we friedi-friedi fi get briev, an elp di wan dem we wiik iina eni kain-a wie tu. An beg unu du, tek unu taim wid evribadi.

Rejoice always.|Mek shuor se nobadi no chriit sumadi bad kaaz dat de sumadi did chriit dem bad, bot unu fi aalwiez chrai fi diil wid unu wan aneda gud, an diil wid ada piipl gud tu. 16Unu fi tan api aal di taim.
Pray without ceasing.
column2: No tap prie. 18No mata wa apm gi Gad nof tangks kaaz a dat Gad waahn unu fi du nou dat unu an Jiizas Krais kluos.

column1: In everything give thanks, for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.|No mata wa apm gi Gad nof tangks kaaz a dat Gad waahn unu fi du nou dat unu an Jiizas Krais kluos.
Do not quench the Spirit.
column2: No uol dong ar shot op di Uoli Spirit.

column1: Do not despise prophecies.
column2: No se di mesij we piipl kliem se dem get fram Gad a fuulinish

column1: Examine all things. Firmly hold onto what is good.
column2: bot tes evriting. Eng aan pan wa gud

column1: Abstain from all appearances of evil.
column2: an kip we fram aal kain-a sitn we bad.

column1: May the very God of peace sanctify you completely. And I pray to God that your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.|Wi prie se Gad imself we gi piipl piis, wi put unu wan said fi liv fi im an sorv im wid aal a unu aat, an wi mek unu tan jos laik im iina evri wie. An wi prie se im wi no mek no paat a unu — spirit, suol ar badi, kyan get bliem fi notn wen wi Laad Jiizas Krais kom bak.
Faithful is He who calls you, who also will do it.|Di wan we kaal unu, im aalwiez du wa im se im a-go du, an im wi du dis tu.
Brothers, pray for us.|Breda an sista, prie fi wi.
Greet all the brothers with a holy kiss.|Wen unu kom kom worship, kis di breda an sista dem an tel dem oudi.
I command you by the Lord that this letter be read to all the holy brothers.
column2: Mi a tel unu iina di Laad niem se unu fi riid da leta ya tu aal a di breda an sista dem.

column1: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
column2: Mi prie se wi Laad Jiizas Krais wi shuo unu lov iivn duo wi no dizorv it.

column1: Paul, and Silas, and Timothy,To the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ:|Dis a Paal. A mi, Silvanos an Timoti a rait da leta ya.Wi a rait di uol a unu we de a Tesalonaika we biliiv iina Jiizas Krais, an we bilang tu Gad an Krais Jiizas.
Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.|Wi prie se wi Faada Gad an di Laad Jiizas Krais wi aalwiez shuo unu lov, iivn duo wi no dizorv it, an gi unu piis iina unu aat.

We are bound to thank God always for you, brothers, as it is fitting, because your faith is growing abundantly, and the love of every one of you abounds toward each other.|Breda an sista, wi fi gi Gad tangks fi unu aal di wail — an dat a di rait ting tu. Wi fi gi tangks, kaaz unu a chos iina Gad muo an muo an a lov unu wan aneda muo an muo tu.

So we boast about you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that you are enduring.|Siek-a dat, wi fi wan afi buos bout unu iina aal a Gad choch dem, kaaz unu eng aan no mata wa. An unu a chos iina Gad iivn duo unu a sofa an a go chuu nof chraiyal an chibilieshan.

This is evidence that God’s judgment, being righteous, will count you worthy of the kingdom of God for which you are suffering.|Aal a dem sitn ya shuo plien plien se Gad joj piipl ou dem fi get joj, kaaz im a get unu redi fi im kindom we unu a sofa fa.
It is a righteous matter with God to repay with tribulation those who trouble you|An sins Gad fier, di piipl dem we kaaz unu fi sofa, im a-go mek dem sofa tu.

and to give you who are troubled rest with us when the Lord Jesus is revealed from heaven with His mighty angels|An unu we a sofa, im a-go mek di sofarieshan tap wen di Laad Jiizas kom fram evn an shuo imself. Da taim de aal a wi a-go get fi res, wi naa go sofa no muo. Jiizas a-go kom fram evn wid im powaful ienjel dem
in flaming fire taking vengeance on those who do not know God and do not obey the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ
column2: wid wan faiya we a bliez. Im a-go bring dong jojment pan aal a uu no nuo Gad an dem de we no fala di Gud Nyuuz bout wi Laad Jiizas.

column1: They shall be punished with eternal destruction, isolated from the presence of the Lord and from the glory of His power|Dem a-go get ponish. Dem a-go sofa fi eva an eva, kaaz dem naa go kyan de we di Laad de, an dem naa go eva get fi si ou di Laad big an powaful.

when He comes, in that Day, to be glorified in His saints and to be marveled at by all those who believe, because our testimony among you was believed.|Di Laad Jiizas a-go du aal a dem sopm ya wen im kom bak pan jojment die fi get priez siek-a di wok we im du iina fi im piipl dem. Unu a-go de de a priez im tu. Kaaz unu did biliiv di sitn dem we wi nuo fi wiself an did kom tel unu.

Therefore we always pray for you that our God would count you worthy of this calling and with power fulfill all your good desires and works done by faith|A dat mek wi kip aan a prie fi unu. Wi prie se Gad wi mek unu gud inof fi di kain-a laif we im kaal unu fa. An wi prie se Gad wi elp unu so dat wid fi im powa unu wi du aal a di gud sitn dem we unu waahn fi du, an unu wi du dem tu kaaz unu biliiv iina im.

so that the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you, and you in Him, according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ.|Da wie de, di Laad Jiizas Krais wi get priez an unu kyan get big op tu. Dis kyan apm kaaz fi wi Gad an wi Laad Jiizas Krais lov wi iivn duo wi no dizorv it.

Now, brothers, concerning the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, and concerning our gathering together unto Him, we ask you |Nou breda an sista, bout di die wen wi Laad Jiizas Krais a kom bak, an ou di uol a wi a-go get gyada op fi go miit im — wi a aks unu du

not to let your mind be quickly shaken or be troubled, neither in spirit nor by word, nor by letter coming as though from us, as if the day of Christ is already here. |no bada mek nobadi twis op unu ed an fraitn unu so dat unu kyaahn iivn tingk chriet. Nobadi! No mek no mesij we nobadi kliem se dem get fram di spirit an no faam a leta we kliem se it kom fram wi we a tel unu bout se: di die wen di Laad fi kom bak de ya aredi. No mek non a dat twis op unu ed. No biliiv non a dat!

Do not let anyone deceive you in any way. For that Day will not come unless a falling away comes first, and the man of sin is revealed, the son of destruction|No mek nobadi fuul unu op non at aal. Kaaz da die de naa kom til wan taim kom wen uol iip a piipl a-go go gens Gad an no waahn av notn fi du wid im. An da die de naa kom til di Man we brok Gad Laa shuo op — di man we Gad boun fi tier dong an mash op iina el.

who opposes and exalts himself above all that is called God or is worshipped, so that he sits as God in the temple of God, showing himself as God.|Im a-go fait gens eniting an enibadi we piipl kaal gad, an eniting we dem worship. An im a-go put imself aiya dan dem. Im a-go aal tek siit iina Gad ous an kliem se im a Gad.
Do you not remember that when I was still with you, I told you these things?|Unu no memba se mi did a tel unu dem sitn ya wen mi did de mongks unu?
Now you know what restrains him that he might be revealed in his time.|Nou, unu don nuo aredi di wan we a uol im bak, an im a-go gwaan uol im bak so im kyan kom wen a fi im taim fi kom.
For the mystery of lawlessness is already working. Only He who is now restraining him will do so until He is taken out of the way.
column2: Kaaz wan wikid sitn de bout we a wok anda di kwaiyat fi kaaz piipl fi go gens Gad Laa. Bot sumadi a uol it bak. An di wan we a uol it bak a-go gwaan uol it til im get muuv outa di wie.

column1: Then the lawless one will be revealed, whom the Lord will consume with the breath of His mouth, and destroy with the brightness of His presence|An den, di wan we brok Gad Laa a-go shuo op an mek evribadi nuo uu im bi. Bot wen di Laad Jiizas kom im a-go bluo pan im kil im, an Jiizas brait brait lait a-go waip im out fi gud.

even him, whose coming is in accordance with the working of Satan with all power and signs and false wonders|A Sietan a-go mek di wan we brok Gad Laa kom. An im a-go gi im powa fi wok aal kain-a mirikl an shuo aal kain-a sain.

and with all deception of unrighteousness among those who perish, because they did not receive the love for the truth that they might be saved. |Im a-go du aal kain-a wikidnis fi chrik op di piipl dem we boun fi ded, kaaz dem did ton dem bak, an neehn lov di chuut we wuda siev dem.
Therefore God will send them a strong delusion, that they should believe the lie: |So siek-a dat, Gad a sen wan powaful sitn we wi twis op ou dem tingk, so dem kyan biliiv di lai dem.
that they all might be condemned who did not believe the truth but had pleasure in unrighteousness.|So aal a uu neehn biliiv di chuut, bot did wel glad fi tan iina sin, Gad a-go ponish dem.

But we are bound to always give thanks to God for you, beloved brothers of the Lord, because God has from the beginning called you to salvation through sanctification by the Spirit and belief of the truth.|Bot breda an sista, wi afi gi Gad tangks fi unu aal di wail. Di Laad lov unu an so im pik unu an kaal unu fi get siev fram iivn bifuo im mek di worl. Di Spirit kliin unu op fi Gad, an unu biliiv iina di chuut tu, so unu get siev.

To this He called you by our gospel, to obtain the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ.|Gad did kaal unu fi get siev fram di taim wen wi did kom tel unu di Gud Nyuuz. Im kaal unu so unu kyan kom get som a di ana we wi Laad Jiizas Krais av.

Therefore, brothers, stand firm and hold the traditions which you have been taught, whether by word or by our letter.|So breda an sista, tan op chrang an eng aan tait pan di sitn dem we wi tiich unu — weda a se wi did se dem, ar a rait wi did rait dem.

Now may our Lord Jesus Christ Himself, and God our Father, who has loved us and has given us eternal consolation and good hope through grace|Nou, wi prie tu wi Laad Jiizas Krais imself an wi Faada Gad — Gad lov wi an no tap gi wi gud wod fi mek wi aat chrang, an im mek wi kyan luk faawod tu som gud sitn tu we im pramis fi gi wi, duo wi no dizorv dem at aal at aal.
comfort your hearts and establish you in every good word and work.|Wi prie se wi Laad Jiizas an wi Faada Gad wi gwaan gi unu gud wod an mek unu aat chrang, so unu wi aalwiez se an du wa gud.

Finally, brothers, pray for us, that the word of the Lord may quickly spread and be glorified, even as it did with you.|Breda an sista ier wa wi a se bifuo wi don ya-so — wi a beg unu fi prie fi wi. Prie se Gad mesij wi pred faas faas an piipl wi ana it no mata wich paat it go, jos laik wa did apm wen it kom tu unu.
And pray that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men, for not all men have faith. |An prie se Gad wi siev wi fram di wikid an torbl piipl dem, kaaz a no evribadi biliiv iina di Laad.

But the Lord is faithful, who will establish you and guard you from the evil one. |Bot, memba se Gad wi aalwiez du wa im se im a-go du. Im a-go mek unu aat chrang, an im wi protek unu fram di wikid wan.

We have confidence in the Lord concerning you, that you are doing and will do the things which we command you. |Di Laad mek wi kyan chos se unu a du aal a wa wi tel unu fi du. An im mek wi kyan chos se unu wi gwaan du dat.

May the Lord direct your hearts to the love of God and to the steadfastness of Christ.|Nou, mi prie se di Laad wi mek unu andastan umoch im lov unu an elp unu fi eng aan an no gi op siem laik wa Krais Jiizas did du.

Now we command you, brothers, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that you withdraw yourselves from every brother who walks in idleness and not according to the tradition that he received from us. |Nou, breda an sista, iina wi Laad Jiizas Krais niem, wi a tel unu, kip we fram enibadi we se dem biliiv bot no waahn wok, an we naa waak laik ou wi tel unu fi waak.
For you know how you should follow us. For we were not idle among you|Kaaz unu siem wan don nuo aredi se unu fi fala wi, an wi neehn aigl an liezi wen wi did de mongks unu.

neither did we eat anyone’s bread without paying for it, but we worked tirelessly and toiled night and day that we might not be a burden to any of you. |Wi neehn tek nobadi fuud an nyam it ef wi neehn pie fa. Nuo, wi wok aad, die an nait so wi no afi presha an bordn dong nobadi.

We did this, not because we did not have that right, but to make ourselves an example for you to follow.|A no kaaz wi no av di rait fi du dat mek wi neehn du it yu no, bot a kaaz wi waahn mek shuor se unu si ou unu fi liv, an liv da wie de.
For when we were with you, we commanded you that if any will not work, neither shall he eat.|Kaaz aal wen wi did de mongks unu, wi did gi unu da ruul ya, “Ef sumadi no waahn wok no mek dem nyam.”

For we hear that there are some among you who live in idleness, mere busybodies, not working at all. |Wi tel unu dat kaaz wi ier bout som a unu we a waak roun aigl an naa wok non at aal. No onggl dat, bot dem aal a faas wid we ada piipl a du tu.

Now, concerning those who are such, we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ that they quietly work and eat their own bread.|Nou, iina wi Laad Jiizas Krais niem, wi did a tel dem piipl de an wi push dem aad fi go sekl dong an fain wok so dem kyan bai dem uona fuud an nyam.
But you, brothers, do not be weary in doing good.|Bot breda an sista, unu no fi get taiyad fi du di rait sitn dem.

If anyone does not obey our word in this letter, note that man, and do not socialize with him, so that he may be ashamed.|An ef sumadi no fala wa wi se iina da leta ya maak dem fies, an no diil wid dem so dem fiil shiem.

Still, do not count him as an enemy, but admonish him as a brother.|Bot no chriit dem laik se dem a unu enimi, nuo man. Bot waan dem laik ou unu wuda waan unu uona breda an sista we biliiv iina Jiizas.

Now may the Lord of peace Himself give you peace always in every way. The Lord be with you all.|Nou mi prie se di Laad imself we gi piis, wi gi unu piis iina unu aat fi eva, no mata wa a gwaan. An mi prie se im wi tan wid di uol a unu.

I, Paul, write this greeting with my own hand, and this is the distinguishing mark in every letter: So I write.|Dis a mi, Paal. Mi a rait dem wod ya wid mi uona an fi shuo unu se da leta ya a fram mi. A so mi rait aal a mi leta dem.
The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen.
column2: Mi prie se wi Laad Jiizas Krais wi shuo unu lov iivn duo wi no dizorv it.

column1: Finally, brothers, pray for us, that the word of the Lord may quickly spread and be glorified, even as it did with you.|Breda an sista ier wa wi a se bifuo wi don ya-so — wi a beg unu fi prie fi wi. Prie se Gad mesij wi pred faas faas an piipl wi ana it no mata wich paat it go, jos laik wa did apm wen it kom tu unu.
And pray that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men, for not all men have faith.|An prie se Gad wi siev wi fram di wikid an torbl piipl dem, kaaz a no evribadi biliiv iina di Laad.

But the Lord is faithful, who will establish you and guard you from the evil one.|Bot, memba se Gad wi aalwiez du wa im se im a-go du. Im a-go mek unu aat chrang, an im wi protek unu fram di wikid wan.

We have confidence in the Lord concerning you, that you are doing and will do the things which we command you. |Di Laad mek wi kyan chos se unu a du aal a wa wi tel unu fi du. An im mek wi kyan chos se unu wi gwaan du dat.

May the Lord direct your hearts to the love of God and to the steadfastness of Christ.|Nou, mi prie se di Laad wi mek unu andastan umoch im lov unu an elp unu fi eng aan an no gi op siem laik wa Krais Jiizas did du.

Now we command you, brothers, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that you withdraw yourselves from every brother who walks in idleness and not according to the tradition that he received from us. |Nou, breda an sista, iina wi Laad Jiizas Krais niem, wi a tel unu, kip we fram enibadi we se dem biliiv bot no waahn wok, an we naa waak laik ou wi tel unu fi waak.
For you know how you should follow us. For we were not idle among you|Kaaz unu siem wan don nuo aredi se unu fi fala wi, an wi neehn aigl an liezi wen wi did de mongks unu.

neither did we eat anyone’s bread without paying for it, but we worked tirelessly and toiled night and day that we might not be a burden to any of you. |Wi neehn tek nobadi fuud an nyam it ef wi neehn pie fa. Nuo, wi wok aad, die an nait so wi no afi presha an bordn dong nobadi.

We did this, not because we did not have that right, but to make ourselves an example for you to follow. |A no kaaz wi no av di rait fi du dat mek wi neehn du it yu no, bot a kaaz wi waahn mek shuor se unu si ou unu fi liv, an liv da wie de.
For when we were with you, we commanded you that if any will not work, neither shall he eat.|Kaaz aal wen wi did de mongks unu, wi did gi unu da ruul ya, “Ef sumadi no waahn wok no mek dem nyam.”

For we hear that there are some among you who live in idleness, mere busybodies, not working at all.|Wi tel unu dat kaaz wi ier bout som a unu we a waak roun aigl an naa wok non at aal. No onggl dat, bot dem aal a faas wid we ada piipl a du tu.

Now, concerning those who are such, we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ that they quietly work and eat their own bread.|Nou, iina wi Laad Jiizas Krais niem, wi did a tel dem piipl de an wi push dem aad fi go sekl dong an fain wok so dem kyan bai dem uona fuud an nyam.
But you, brothers, do not be weary in doing good.|Bot breda an sista, unu no fi get taiyad fi du di rait sitn dem.

If anyone does not obey our word in this letter, note that man, and do not socialize with him, so that he may be ashamed.|An ef sumadi no fala wa wi se iina da leta ya maak dem fies, an no diil wid dem so dem fiil shiem.

Still, do not count him as an enemy, but admonish him as a brother.|Bot no chriit dem laik se dem a unu enimi, nuo man. Bot waan dem laik ou unu wuda waan unu uona breda an sista we biliiv iina Jiizas.

Now may the Lord of peace Himself give you peace always in every way. The Lord be with you all.|Nou mi prie se di Laad imself we gi piis, wi gi unu piis iina unu aat fi eva, no mata wa a gwaan. An mi prie se im wi tan wid di uol a unu.

I, Paul, write this greeting with my own hand, and this is the distinguishing mark in every letter: So I write.|Dis a mi, Paal. Mi a rait dem wod ya wid mi uona an fi shuo unu se da leta ya a fram mi. A so mi rait aal a mi leta dem.
The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen.
column2: Mi prie se wi Laad Jiizas Krais wi shuo unu lov iivn duo wi no dizorv it.

column1: Paul and Timothy, servants of Jesus Christ, To all the saints in Christ Jesus who are at Philippi, with the overseers and deacons:|Da leta ya a kom fram mi, Paal. Timoti de ya wid mi tu. Di tuu a wi a Krais Jiizas sliev. Mi a rait tu aal a unu we liv iina Filipai we chos Krais Jiizas. An mi a rait tu aal a di bishop an di diikan dem tu.

Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.|Mi prie se Faada Gad, an wi Laad Jiizas Krais wi lov unu, iivn duo wi no dizorv it. An mi prie tu se im wi gi unu piis iina unu aat.
I thank my God for every reminder of you.|Evritaim mi memba unu, mi gi Gad tangks fi unu.
In every prayer of mine for you all, I have always made requests with joy|Evritaim mi prie fi unu, sitn bobl op iina mi aat an mek mi wel api.
due to your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now.|Mi api fi unu, kaaz fram di fos die unu biliiv unu staat elp mi pred di Gud Nyuuz, an aal nou unu stil a elp mi.

I am confident of this very thing, that He who began a good work in you will perfect it until the day of Jesus Christ.|So mi nuo dis fi shuor se a Gad imself staat op da gud wok ya iina unu, an im naa go tap nou. Im a-go gwaan du we im a du iina unu laif, til Jiizas Krais kom baka ort.

It is right for me to think this of you all because I have you in my heart, since both in my imprisonments and in the defense and confirmation of the gospel, you all are fellow partakers of my grace.|Mi nuo se it aarait fi mi tingk da wie ya bout aal a unu, kaaz mi lov unu an aal a unu elp mi wen mi did a tan op an a difen di Gud Nyuuz, weda mi did lak op iina prizn ar mi did frii. Aal a unu tek paat iina di gud sitn we Gad gi mi fi du, iivn duo wi no dizorv it.

For God is my witness, how I long after you all with the affection of Jesus Christ.|Gad si an nuo ou mi lang fi si aal a unu. Siek-a di lov we Krais Jiizas gi mi iina mi aat fi unu, mi riili lang fi si unu.
And this I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all discernment|So mi riili a prie se unu wi lov unu wan aneda muor an muor, so unu kyan nuo an andastan
that you may approve things that are excellent so that you may be pure and blameless for the day of Christ
column2: an fain out di sitn dem we rait. Mi prie se wen unu fain out dem sitn de unu wi liv rait so nobadi kyaahn paint no fingga pan unu wen Krais Jiizas kom bak

column1: being filled with the fruit of righteousness, which comes through Jesus Christ, for the glory and praise of God.|an dat evriting we unu du wi gud fi chuu — a onggl Krais Jiizas kyan mek unu du dem sitn de. Mi a prie fi aal a dat so dat Faada Gad wi get nof rispek an priez.

But I want you to know, brothers, that the things which happened to me have resulted in advancing the gospel|Ier mi nou breda an sista, mi waahn unu fi andastan se aal we apm tu mi onggl mek di Gud Nyuuz bout Jiizas pred muor an muor.
so that my imprisonments in Christ have become known throughout the entire palace guard and to all the rest.
column2: Matarafak aal a di speshal suoja dem we gyaad di suoja kyamp wich paat mi de an evribadi els ya nuo se mi get lak op iina prizn kaaz mi a priich bout Jiizas Krais.

column1: And a great many of the brothers in the Lord, having become confident because of my incarcerations, have dared to speak the word without fear.|An siek-a ou mi iina prizn, muos a di breda an sista dem get briev an a priich Gad wod, an no friedi-friedi no muor.

Some indeed are preaching Christ out of envy and strife, and some also from good will. |Som a dem we a priich Gad mesij bad main fi riil an dem a luk waar wid wi. Bot som riili a priich Gad mesij outa wan gud aat.

The former preach Christ out of contention, not sincerely, intending to add trouble to my circumstance.|Di wan dem we priich Gad mesij outa gud aat, du it kaaz dem lov mi an dem nuo se mi de ya fi tan op fi di Gud Nyuuz.

But the latter preach out of love, knowing that I am appointed for the defense of the gospel.|Di ada wan dem priich, bot dem no riili miin we dem a se, dem a du it fi di rang riizn. Dem a du it kaaz dem waahn fi mek mi av muo chobl fi diil wid iina prizn ya.

What then? Only that in every way, whether in pretense or in truth, Christ is preached. And in this I rejoice.Indeed, I will rejoice. |Bot wa dat tu mi? Di onggl ting we riili mata tu mi a se di Gud Nyuuz bout Krais Jiizas a priich weda dem a du it fi di rait ar fi di rang riizn. An kaaz it a priich, mi api, an mi a-go gwaan mek miself api.

For I know that through your prayer and the support of the Spirit of Jesus Christ, this will result in my deliverance. |Kaaz Jiizas Krais Spirit a elp mi, an kaaz unu a prie fi mi, mi nuo se aal a di sitn dem we apm tu mi a-go wok out so dat mi get frii.

Accordingly, it is my earnest expectation and my hope that I shall be ashamed in nothing, but that with all boldness as always, so now also, Christ will be magnified in my body, whether it be by life or by death.|So diip dong iina mi aat, mi riili chos se notn we mi du ar we mi se a-go mek mi shiem. Bot laik mi aalwiez du, an a du rait ya nou, mi eva a-go priich an no fried a notn, an mi eva a-go mek Krais Jiizas get nof rispek, weda mi ded ar alaiv.
For to me, to continue living is Christ, and to die is gain.|Ou mi si it, a Jiizas Krais mi a liv fa. An ef mi ded, it wuda onggl ton out beta fi mi.

But if I am to live on in the flesh, this will mean fruitful labor to me. Yet I do not know what I shall choose.|Bot ef mi fi gwaan liv iina da badi ya, mi wi get fi du nof muor sitn fi Jiizas. So wich wan mi fi pik? Mi riili no nuo.

I am in a difficult position between the two, having a desire to depart and to be with Christ, which is far better.|Mi no nuo wich wan fi pik. It komiin laik eniwe mi ton maka juk mi. Mi wuda waahn fi ded an go liv wid Krais Jiizas dan tan ya, kaaz dat wuda uol iip beta fi mi.
Nevertheless, to remain in the flesh is more needful for your sake. |Bot unu niid mi fi elp unu. So, it wuda beta fi mi tan iina da badi ya.

Having this confidence, I know that I shall remain and continue with you all for your joyful advancement of the faith|An mi nuo fi shuor se mi a-go tan ya wid unu an gwaan elp unu so dat unu wi chos iina Gad muor an muor, an so dat unu wi muor api bout wa unu biliiv.

so that your rejoicing for me may be more abundant in Jesus Christ when I am in your presence again.|So wen mi kom bak kom luk fi unu agen, unu wi kyan priez Krais Jiizas nof muor, siek-a wa im yuuz mi fi du fi unu.

Only let your conduct be worthy of the gospel of Christ, that whether or not I come and see you, I may hear of your activities, that you are standing fast in one spirit, with one mind, striving together for the faith of the gospel.|So mek shuor se unu liv ou di Gud Nyuuz bout Krais Jiizas se unu fi liv. Da wie de weda mi kom luk fi unu, ar mi no kom, mi wi ier se aal a unu a tan op chrang tugeda fi di siem ting an a fait fi wa unu biliiv bout di Gud Nyuuz.

Do not be frightened by your adversaries. This is a sign to them of their destruction, but of your salvation, and this from God. |An no mek nobadi we a fait gens unu fraitn unu niida. Tan op chrang an dat wi shuo dem se dem a-go luuz an dat unu a-go win. A Gad imself a-go mek unu win.

For to you it was granted on behalf of Christ not only to believe in Him, but also to suffer for His sake|Kaaz Gad so gud tu unu, im gi unu di chaans, no onggl fi biliiv iina Jiizas Krais bot fi sofa fi im tu.
having the same conflict which you saw in me and now hear is in me.|Di siem sitn dem we unu did si mi go chuu an ier se mi stil a-go chuu, a di siem sitn unu a diil wid nou.

If there is any encouragement in Christ, if any comfort of love, if any fellowship of the Spirit, if any compassion and mercy|Krais Jiizas mek unu chrang, kaaz unu an im kluos. Im lov unu, so unu no afi wori bout notn. Unu an im Uoli Spirit a wan. Wen wan a unu a sofa di uol a unu fiil it. An unu kain tu unu wan aneda.

then fulfill my joy and be like-minded, having the same love, being in unity with one mind.|So mi beg unu mek mi aat wel api: lov unu wan aneda iina di siem wie an kom tugeda an biliiv di siem sitn. Aal a unu fi waahn di siem sitn an unu fi wok tugeda fi di siem riizn.

Let nothing be done out of strife or conceit, but in humility let each esteem the other better than himself.|So no du notn jos so unu kyan get wa unu waahn. An no shuo aaf fi chrai mek piipl tingk unu impuotant ar beta dan nobadi. Wa unu fi du a ombl unuself an chriit wan aneda beta dan ou unu wuda chriit unuself.
Let each of you look not only to your own interests, but also to the interests of others.|An unu no fi luk out onggl fi unuself wan, bot unu fi kier bout unu breda an sista dem tu.
Let this mind be in you all, which was also in Christ Jesus|Unu si siem laik ou Krais Jiizas tan, a siem so unu fi tan tu, an unu fi tingk jos laik ou im tingk:
who, being in the form of God,did not consider equality with God something to be grasped.|Iina evri wie im did aalwiez tan laik Gad,bot im neva tingk se im did afi eng aan pan dat.

But He emptied Himself, taking upon Himself the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men. Consider equality with God something to be grasped.|Insted-a dat, im gi op evriting laik se im a neehn nobadi,an im kom dong a ort kom sorv laik wan slievan kom mongks wi laik wan naamal sumadi.

And being found in the form of a man,He humbled Himselfand became obedient to death,even death on a cross.|An wen im du dat, im ombl imselfan du aal we Faada Gad did waahn im fi du — im aal gi op im laif pan di kraas.

Therefore God highly exalted Him and gave Him the name which is above every name|Siek-a we im du, Faada Gad tek im op a evn an put im iina di tap-a-tap pozishanan gi im wan speshal niem we biga dan evri ada niem.

that at the name of Jesus every knee should bow,of those in heaven and on earth and under the earth|Faada Gad du dat so evribadi iina evn, an pan ort an anda di ortwi afi go dong pan dem nii siek-a di niem Jiizas

and every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord,to the glory of God the Father.|an so dat evribadi wi afi go taak wid dem uona mout mek piipl ier, se, “Jiizas Krais a fi dem Laad.”An wen dem se dat, Faada Gad wi get big op an nof rispek.

Therefore, my beloved, as you have always obeyed, not only in my presence, but so much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling. |So mi gud fren, unu si siem laik ou unu aalwiez du we Gad waahn unu fi du, no onggl wen mi de de wid unu bot wos laik ou mi no de de, gwaan du di sitn dem we wi mek piipl si se Gad siev unu an unu av nof rispek fi im iina evriting we unu a du.

For God is the One working in you, both to will and to do His good pleasure.|Unu kyan liv da wie de, kaaz a Gad a wok iina unu laif. A Gad mek unu waahn fi du di sitn dem we im waahn unu fi du. An a im gi unu di chrent fi du dem tu. An wen unu du dem, it mek im wel api.
Do all things without murmuring and disputing
column2: Du we unu afi du an no bada grombl grombl an aagyu bout wa unu fi du.

column1: that you may be blameless and harmless, sons of God, without fault, in the midst of a crooked and perverse generation, in which you shine as lights in the world. |Da wie de, nobadi kyaahn paint no fingga pan unu, kaaz unu a Gad pikni we a liv kliin an naa miks op iina di torbl sitn dem we di piipl we a liv iina da taim ya a du. Nuo! Unu a shain laik wan brait lait iina di worl.

Hold forth the word of life that I may rejoice on the day of Christ that I have not run in vain or labored in vain.|Unu fi tel di piipl dem Gad mesij — Gad mesij bout ou dem kyan get di laif we mek dem liv fi eva an eva. Unu fi du dat, so dat wen Krais Jiizas kom baka ort, mi wi kyan buos bout unu se mi neehn ron ar wok so aad mongks unu fi notn.

Yes, and even if I am offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith, I take delight and rejoice with you all. |Bot iivn ef dem kil mi an jrien out mi blod laik wain we dem chuo pan sakrifais gi Gad, kaaz unu biliiv iina im an a sorv im, mi wi api. Ye! Mi an unu a-go api tugeda.
For this reason you also take delight and rejoice with me.
column2: A siem so unu fi api. Unu fi api wid mi tu.

column1: I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timothy shortly to you, that I also may be of good comfort when I get word concerning you. |Mi prie se wi Laad Jiizas wi lou mi fi sen Timoti tu unu suun, so dat dem kyan kom bak an tel mi ou unu a du, an so dat mi no afi wori bout notn.
For I have no one like-minded, who will sincerely care for your welfare.|Kaaz mi no av nobadi els laik im we riili kier bout unu an ou unu du.
For all seek their own, not the things of Christ Jesus. |Kaaz evribadi els onggl a luk out fi demself. Dem no bizniz bout notn we Jiizas Krais kier bout.

But you know of his proven worth, that as a son with a father, he has served with me in the gospel.|Bot unu wel nuo se di wie ou Timoti liv shuo se im riili wok gud fi chuu, kaaz siem laik ou wan faada an im bwai pikni wok wid dem wan aneda, a siem so im wok kluos wid mi fi pred di Gud Nyuuz.
Therefore I hope to send him soon after my situation is resolved.
column2: So mi plan fi sen im tu unu afta mi fain out ef dem a-go let mi outa prizn.

column1: But I trust in the Lord that I, myself, shall also come shortly.|Bot mi chos di Laad se dem suun frii mi, so mi kyan kom luk fi unu tu.

Yet I thought it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus, who is my brother and companion in labor, fellow soldier, your messenger, and he who ministered to my necessity.|Bot mi tingk se mi riili afi go sen bak Epafrodaitos kom a unu. Im a mi breda an di tuu a wi wok tugeda an im tan op chrang wid mi laik wan suoja. A im unu did sen fi tek kier a aal wa mi did niid.
For he longed after you all and was filled with heaviness, because you heard that he was sick. |Im wel waahn si aal a unu, an im a lang fi kom uom tu, kaaz im nuo se unu did ier se im did sik.

Indeed he was sick, near death. But God had mercy on him, and not only on him, but also on me, lest I should have had sorrow upon sorrow.|An im riili did sik fi chuu. Likl muos im ded, bot Gad tek piti pan im. An a no im wan Gad tek piti pan. Im tek piti pan mi tu, kaaz im neehn waahn mi fi av chobl pan tap a chobl.

Therefore I sent him the more eagerly, that when you see him again, you may rejoice and I may be less sorrowful. |So mi wel waahn sen im bak tu unu, so dat wen unu si im unu wi api an mi wi no afi a wori op miself.
So receive him in the Lord with all joy. And hold such ones in high regard|So wen im kom, tek im iin an chriit im gud laik wan a di Laad piipl dem, an gi im di kain-a rispek we piipl laik im fi get.

because for the work of Christ he was near death, not regarding his life, endeavoring to make up for your lack of service toward me.|Kaaz im aalmuos ded siek-a wa im did a du fi Krais Jiizas. Iivn duo im nuo se im kuda ded, im du fi mi di sitn dem we unu kudn du.

Finally, my brothers, rejoice in the Lord. To write the same things to you is no trouble to me, and it is reassuring for you. |Mi breda an sista, dem ya a di laas sitn dem we mi av fi se. Mi prie se Krais Jiizas wi mek unu wel api. A no notn fi mi rait tu unu bout di siem sitn dem uova an uova agen. Matarafak, dem wi elp kip unu sief tu.

Watch out for dogs, watch out for evil workers, watch out for those who practice mutilation.|Mi a waan unu, wach out fi di daag aat piipl dem. Wach out fi dem — dem a uol wikid. Wach out fi dem man de we aalwiez a kot kot op dem badi.

For we are the circumcision who worship God in the Spirit, and boast in Christ Jesus, and place no trust in the flesh|Bot a wi a di piipl we riili get sorkomsaiz — no dem. Wi a di wan we worship Gad iina di Spirit, priez Krais Jiizas, an no buos aaf bout uu wi bi.

though I also have confidence in the flesh.If any other man thinks that he has reason to trust in the flesh, I have more:|Mi dipen pan Gad iivn duo mi av nof sitn we mi kuda buos bout ef mi did waahn buos. Ef nobadi tingk se dem av notn fi buos bout, mi av nof muor.

I was circumcised the eighth day, of the stock of Israel, of the tribe of Benjamin, and a Hebrew of Hebrews; as concerning the law, a Pharisee;|Mi did get sorkomsaiz iet die afta mi baan. Fi mi mada an faada a baan Izrelait. Mi kom fram Benjamin chraib a piipl dem. Mi a Iibruu iina evri wie. Wen it kom tu di Laa, mi a wan Farisii we du evriting we di Laa se fi du.

concerning zeal, persecuting the church; and concerning the righteousness which is in the law, blameless.|Mi did so siiros fi du we mi tingk Gad di se fi du dat mi yuus tu mek Jiizas piipl dem sofa bad bad, kaaz mi did tingk dem did a go gens Gad. Wen it kom tu du we di Laa se, notn neva lef we mi neva du. So nobadi kudn paint no fingga pan mi.

But what things were gain to me, I have counted these things to be loss for the sake of Christ.|Bot aal a dem sitn de wa mi yuus tu dipen pan fi mek mi rait iina Gad yai, dem komiin laik gyaabij nou. Dem no mek no sens nou dat mi an Krais Jiizas kluos.

Yes, certainly, I count everything as loss for the excellence of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord, for whom I have forfeited the loss of all things and count them as rubbish that I may gain Christ|Bot a no onggl dat, mi si se aal a dem sitn de no wot notn. Dem kyaahn kom kluos tu di powa we kom wen yu nuo mi Laad Jiizas Krais. Wen yu nuo Jiizas Krais, notn at aal kyaahn kom kluos tu dat. Evriting els komiin laik gyaabij tu mi nou. Mi gi op evriting fi get fi nuo Krais Jiizas an dat a di onggl ting we mata tu mi nou.

and be found in Him, not having my own righteousness which is from the law, but that which is through faith in Christ, the righteousness which is of God on the basis of faith|Mi waahn Jiizas fi tek ful kanchuol a mi — badi an suol. Mi naa dipen pan notn we di Laa se, ar we mi kyan du fi mek miself rait iina Gad yai. Mi a dipen pan di rait sitn dem we Jiizas du, kaaz fi get rait iina Gad yai yu afi dipen onggl pan wa Jiizas du.

to know Him, and the power of His resurrection, and the fellowship of His sufferings, being conformed to His death|Aal mi kier bout a fi nuo Krais Jiizas, an dat di powa we mek im kom bak alaiv wi wok iina mi. Mi waahn fi kyan go chuu eniting we mi afi sofa fi du we Gad waahn mi fi du, siem laik ou Krais Jiizas go chuu we im did sofa fi du we Gad did waahn im fi du. An siem laik ou im ded fi di rait riizn, mi mek op mi main fi ded fi im tu
if somehow I might make it to the resurrection of the dead.|so dat, iina som kain-a wie, mi kyan en op mongks di wan dem we kom bak alaiv afta dem ded.

Not that I have already attained or have already been perfected, but I follow after it so that I may lay hold of that for which I was seized by Christ Jesus.|Mi naa se mi riich we mi waahn fi riich aredi, ar dat evriting we Jiizas kaal mi fa mi a it aredi. Bot mi a pres aad aad fi ton di kain-a sumadi Krais Jiizas pik an waahn mi fi bi.

Brothers, I do not count myself to have attained, but this one thing I do, forgetting those things which are behind and reaching forward to those things which are ahead|Mi breda an sista, mi naa se mi a evriting we Krais Jiizas waahn mi fi bi yet. Bot da wan sitn ya mi a mek shuor a, mi naa luk bak pan di sitn dem we mi ton we fram. Mi a pres aad aad an a luk infronta mi an a riich fi wa a kom.

I press toward the goal to the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.|Mi a push aad fi go chuu an finish di ries an fi get di sitn dem we Gad pudong iina evn fi mi, kaaz a dat Gad kaal mi fi chos Krais Jiizas fa.

Therefore let those of us who are mature be thus minded. And if you think differently in any way, God will reveal even this to you. |So aal a wi we tingk di wie Krais Jiizas waahn wi fi tingk, wi fi gwaan tingk da wie de. Bot ef non a unu no si tingz da wie de, Gad wi shuo unu an mek unu andastan wa mi se.
Nevertheless, according to what we have already attained, let us walk by the same rule, let us be of the same mind.|Eniwie, mek wi gwaan uol aan pan wa Gad mek wi nuo aredi.

Brothers, become fellow imitators with me and observe those who walk according to our example.|So breda an sista, aal a unu fi liv laik ou mi liv. Luk fi di piipl dem we liv laik ou mi liv an fala dem.

For many are walking in such a way that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ. I have told you of them often and tell you again, even weeping. |Di sitn dem we mi a tel unu nou mi did tel unu bout dem nof taim aredi. An nou dat mi a tel unu agen, dem a mek mi baal kaaz nof a dem piipl de we a kaal demself Krais Jiizas falara, dem a muuv laik se dem a Krais Jiizas enimi — Krais Jiizas we ded pan di kraas.

Their destination is destruction, their god is their appetite, their glory is in their shame, their minds are set on earthly things. |Dem piipl de, fi dem gad a dem beli an wa dem badi waahn. Di sitn dem we dem shuda shiem bout, a dem sitn de dem a buos bout. Di onggl ting we ful op dem main a di sitn dem we iina da worl ya. Gad gweehn mash dong dem piipl de.

But our citizenship is in heaven, from where also we await for our Savior, the Lord Jesus Christ|Bot evn a fi wi konchri. An a de-so di wan we siev wi de, Jiizas Krais wi Laad, an wi kyaahn wiet fi im kom bak!

who will transform our body of humiliation, so that it may be conformed to His glorious body, according to the working of His power even to subdue all things to Himself.|Im a-go yuuz im powa an kanchuol evriting. An im a-go yuuz da siem powa de an chienj wi wiik badi dem, an mek dem komiin laik fi im powaful badi.

Therefore, my beloved and longed-for brothers, my joy and crown, so stand fast in the Lord, my beloved.|Mi breda an sista, mi lov unu, an mi mis an lang fi si unu so til. Unu mek mi api, an mi kyan riili buos bout unu, kaaz unu komiin laik wan kroun we mi get fi mi aad wok. So mi waahn unu fi tan op chrang iina wa unu biliiv bout di Laad.
I exhort Euodia and Syntyche to be of the same mind in the Lord.|Mi a beg Yuodiya an mi a beg Sinteki, fi di Laad siek, liv gud wid unu wan aneda.

I ask you also, true companion, help those women who labored with me in the gospel, with Clement also, and with my other fellow laborers, whose names are in the Book of Life.|An mi a beg unu, mi gud gud fren we aalwiez elp mi iina mi wok fi di Laad, elp dem uman ya we aalwiez tan op chrang wid mi an elp mi pred di Gud Nyuuz. Elp Klement an aal a Gad piipl we wok wid mi tu. Dem niem rait dong iina Gad buk we av di niem a evribadi we Gad a-go mek liv fi eva.
Rejoice in the Lord always. Again I will say, rejoice!|Unu fi eva api, kaaz unu an di Laad a wan! Mi a se it agen, unu fi api!
Let everyone come to know your gentleness. The Lord is at hand.
column2: Liv iina wan wie so dat evribadi kyan si se unu tek taim wid ada piipl. Di Laad suun kom bak.

column1: Be anxious for nothing, but in everything, by prayer and supplication with gratitude, make your requests known to God.|No wori wori op unuself bout notn. We unu fi du a prie tu Gad bout evriting, aks im fi we unu waahn, an gi im tangks fi evriting.

And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will protect your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.|Wen unu du dat, Gad wi gi unu piis iina unu aat an main iina wan wie we unu kyaahn iivn andastan. Im a-go du it so unu no afi wori bout notn, kaaz unu an di Laad a wan.

Finally, brothers, whatever things are true, whatever things are honest, whatever things are just, whatever things are pure, whatever things are lovely, whatever things are of good report, if there is any virtue, and if there is any praise, think on these things.|Mi breda an sista, wan muor ting mi waahn se tu unu. Unu si eniting we chuu, eniting we unu kyan rispek, eniting we rait, eniting we gud an kliin, eniting we piipl kyan luk pan an fiil gud bout, eniting we piipl kyan taak gud bout, eniting we fit fi get big op — a dem sitn de unu fi set unu aat an main pan aal di taim.

Do those things which you have both learned and received, and heard and seen in me, and the God of peace will be with you.|Di sitn dem we unu lorn, an we unu get fram mi, an we unu ier an si mi du, a dem sitn de unu fi aalwiez du. Wen unu du dem sitn de, Gad, di onggl wan we kyan gi unu piis iina unu aat an main, im wi bles unu.

I rejoiced in the Lord greatly that now at last you have revived your concern for me. Regarding this, you did care, but you lacked opportunity.|Mi riili api an mi priez di Laad se unu memba mi agen. Mi nuo se unu aalwiez memba mi, bot unu neva av no chaans fi du we unu did riili waahn fi du fi mi.

I do not speak because I have need, for I have learned in whatever state I am to be content.|A no kaaz mi niid notn mek mi a se we mi a se, kaaz mi lorn ou fi satisfai no mata ef mi av nof ar ef mi av likl bit.

I know both how to face humble circumstances and how to have abundance. Everywhere and in all things I have learned the secret, both to be full and to be hungry, both to abound and to suffer need.|Mi nuo ou it fiil fi no av notn an mi nuo ou it fiil fi av nof. Mi lorn ou fi satisfai iina evriting no mata wa apm, weda mi onggri ar mi beli ful, weda mi av nof ar mi no av notn.
I can do all things because of Christ who strengthens me.|Mi kyan du eniting, kaaz Krais Jiizas gi mi di powa fi du it.
Nevertheless you did well having shared in my affliction.
column2: Bot a gud sitn unu did du wen unu did elp mi wen mi did a go chuu mi chobl.

column1: Now you Philippians know also, that in the beginning of the gospel when I departed from Macedonia, no church shared with me in the matter of giving and receiving, except you alone.|Matarafak, unu we de a Filipai wel nuo se di fos taim wen mi priich di Gud Nyuuz tu unu, an did a lef fi go a Masiduoniya, unu a di onggl choch we gi mi notn.
Even in Thessalonica, you sent aid once and again for my necessity|Iivn wen mi did de a Tesalonaika, unu sen mi moni uova an uova wen mi did brok.

not because I desired a gift, but I desire fruit that accumulates to your account.|A no muor moni mi a luk fram unu mek mi a se dem sitn ya, bot mi waahn unu du muor an muor gud sitn so Gad wi pie unu bak wid aal braata.

But I have everything and abound. I have been filled, having received from Epaphroditus the things which were sent from you, like a sweet fragrance, an acceptable sacrifice, well pleasing to God. |Mi get aal a di sitn dem we unu sen. An nou, mi av muor dan we mi niid. So, mi gud nou, kaaz Epafrodaitos gi mi evriting we unu sen kom. Aal a we unu sen kom, komiin laik di swiit sumel we kom fram sakrifais we Gad lov. An Gad api wid dat.

But my God shall supply your every need according to His riches in glory by Christ Jesus.|An kaaz unu an Krais Jiizas kluos, fi mi Gad gweehn gi unu evriting we unu niid. An unu nuo se im wel rich, an we im av kyaahn ron out.
Now to God and our Father be glory forever and ever. Amen.
column2: So mek wi big op an priez Faada Gad fi eva an eva! Iemen!

column1: Greet every saint in Christ Jesus. The brothers who are with me greet you.
column2: Tel aal a Gad piipl we kluos wid Krais Jiizas oudi fi mi. Di breda an sista dem we de ya wid mi sen oudi fi unu tu.

column1: All the saints greet you, especially those who are of Caesar’s household.|Aal a Gad piipl sen oudi fi aal a unu, speshali di wan dem we kom fram Siiza yaad.
The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen.
column2: Mi prie se wi Laad Jiizas Krais wi shuo unu lov an bles unu laif. Iemen!

column1: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ, by the will of God, and Timothy our brother|Da leta ya a fram mi, Paal. Mi a wan a Jiizas Krais Apasl dem kaaz a dat Gad did waahn. An di leta a fram breda Timoti tu.

To the saints and faithful brothers in Christ who are at Colosse:Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.|Wi a rait da leta ya tu aal a Gad piipl dem we de a Kolasi — di breda an sista dem we eva a chos iina Gad an we kluos tu Krais Jiizas:Wi prie se wi Faada Gad wi aalwiez shuo unu lov iivn duo wi no dizorv it, an gi unu piis iina unu aat.
We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, praying always for you.|Gad, wi Laad Jiizas Krais faada, wi eva gi im tangks wen wi prie fi unu.
For we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus and your love for all the saints|Wi tangk im kaaz wi ier se unu chos iina Krais Jiizas, an wi ier ou unu lov aal a Gad piipl dem.
