because of the hope which is laid up for you in heaven, of which you have already heard in the word of the truth of the gospel|Unu du dem sitn de kaaz unu a luk fi get wa Gad put op iina evn fi wi, an unu nuo fi shuor se unu a-go get dem. Wa Gad put op a di sed sitn dem we unu did ier bout wen unu did ier di Gud Nyuuz, an da mesij de chuu.

which has come to you, as it has in all the world, and brings forth fruit, as it has also in you, since the day you heard it and knew the grace of God in truth.|Piipl did bring di Gud Nyuuz kom gi unu. An dem kyari it aal uova di worl. It a bier fruut an a gruo jos laik ou it du mongks unu fram di fos die unu ier it an andastan umoch Gad riili lov wi fi chuu, an ou im chriit wi gud iivn duo wi no dizorv it.

And you also learned of Epaphras, our dear fellow servant, who is a faithful minister of Christ for you|Dis a di sed sitn unu lorn fram wi breda Epafras. Wi lov im. Im sorv Krais Jiizas, jos laik wi, an im wok gud tu. Im wok fi Jiizas no mata wa, an wen im du dat im elp wi.
who also declared to us your love in the Spirit.|Im tel wi se unu lov aal a Gad piipl dem, an unu lov dem wid di lov we Gad Spirit gi unu.

For this reason we also, since the day we heard it, do not cease to pray for you and to ask that you may be filled with the knowledge of His will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding|Siek-a dis, fram di die wi ier dat, wi no tap prie fi unu an a aks Gad fi mek unu nuo fi shuor wa im waahn unu fi du. Wi prie se im Spirit wi mek unu waiz an kyan andastan. Da wie de unu wi riili nuo wa im waahn.

that you may walk in a manner worthy of the Lord, pleasing to all, being fruitful in every good work, and increasing in the knowledge of God|An a so kom unu wi kyan liv laik Gad piipl an eva du di sitn dem we wi mek im api: Unu wi du aal kain-a gud sitn, an get fi riili nuo Gad muo an muo tu.

strengthened with all might according to His glorious power, enduring everything with perseverance and patience joyfully|An wi prie se Gad wi tek fi im powa an mek unu wel chrang, so unu kyan uol aan no mata wa, an no grombl grombl, bot a sing sang iina unu aat

giving thanks to the Father, who has enabled us to be partakers in the inheritance of the saints in light.|an a gi di Faada tangks tu. A Faada Gad mek unu gud inof fi kom get wa im pudong fi im piipl dem iina im kindom. Faada Gad a lait an fi im kindom ful op a im lait.

He has delivered us from the power of darkness and has transferred us into the kingdom of His dear Son|Daaknis did ruul uova wi, an Gad kom siev wi fram di daaknis an bring wi wich paat im Bwai Pikni a-go ruul uova wi — im Bwai Pikni we im lov
in whom we have redemption through His blood, the forgiveness of sins.|an we paadn wi sin dem an mek wi go frii.

He is the image of the invisible God and the firstborn of every creature.|Jiizas a siem laik im Faada. Unu kyaahn si Gad, bot unu kyan luk pan Jiizas an si ou Gad tan. Bifuo Gad mek notn, Jiizas did de de. Im aiya dan evriting we Gad mek.

For by Him all things were created that are in heaven and that are in earth, visible and invisible, whether they are thrones, or dominions, or principalities, or powers. All things were created by Him and for Him.|Kaaz Gad yuuz Jiizas fi mek evriting we de a evn an we de pan di ort: evriting — aal we piipl kyan si an we dem kyaahn si. Evriting — a im mek di powaful spirit dem we a liid, ar a ruul. Evri singgl ting a im mek dem an a im dem mek fa.
He is before all things, and in Him all things hold together. |Im de bout fram bifuo notn at aal did mek. An evriting tan wich paat Gad put dem siek-a im.

He is the head of the body, the church. He is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead, so that in all things He may have the preeminence.|Im a di ed fi di choch, we a fi im badi, so a im kanchuol it. Im a di wan we staat op evriting — a im gi nyuu laif. An im a di fos wan fi ded an kom bak alaiv. Da wie de, im a fos iina evriting an im ruul uova evriting.
For it pleased the Father that in Him all fullness should dwell|Eniting we mek Gad Gad, de iina Jiizas tu. Gad did api wid dat; a im mek it apm so.

and to reconcile all things to Himself by Him, having made peace through the blood of His cross, by Him, I say—whether they are things in earth, or things in heaven.|An Gad yuuz Jiizas fi mek piis wid evriting an fi bring dem bak tu im, weda dem de pan ort ar iina evn. A dat im du wen im mek im Bwai Pikni bliid an ded pan di kraas.

And you, who were formerly alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works, yet now He has reconciled|Wan taim unu did faar fram Gad. A bier wikidnis unu yuus tu tingk bout an du, an dat did mek unu an Gad ton enimi.

in the body of His flesh through death, to present you holy and blameless and above reproach in His sight|Bot nou Gad mek unu im fren siek-a wa apm tu im Bwai Pikni. Im mek im Bwai Pikni ded so unu kuda get gud an kliin, widout no maak ar no sin, an unu no afi fiil gilti, an im naa go bliem unu fi notn wen unu kom infronta im.

if you continue in the faith, grounded and settled, and are not removed from the hope of the gospel, which you have heard, and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven, and of which I, Paul, have become a servant.|A so it go, ef unu riili uol aan chrang an gwaan chos iina im, an ef unu no tap luk faawod tu di gud sitn dem unu ier bout wen unu ier di Gud Nyuuz. Piipl pred da Gud Nyuuz de aal uova di worl. An mi, Paal, mi ton Gad sorvant, so mi kyan pred di Gud Nyuuz tu.

Now I rejoice in my sufferings for your sake and fill up in my flesh that which is lacking in the afflictions of Christ, for the sake of His body, which is the church.|Rait ya nou, mi api se mi a sofa fi unu. Mi a sofa laik ou Krais Jiizas did sofa, so mi kyan go chuu aal a we mi fi go chuu. Di sofarieshan mi a go chuu a fi mek gud sitn apm tu di choch, Krais badi.

I have been made a servant of it according to the commission of God, which has been given to me for you, to fulfill the word of God|Mi de bout fi sorv di choch, kaaz Gad pik mi fi du it. Im pik mi fi elp unu an fi mek unu kyan nuo evri piis a im mesij.

even the mystery which has been hidden from past ages and generations, but now is revealed to His saints. |Di mesij a di siikrit we Gad did aid fram wen! Di siem siikrit we nobadi at aal neehn nuo bout. Bot nou, Gad mek fi im piipl dem, we gud an kliin, nuo bout it.

To them God would make known what is the glorious riches of this mystery among the nations. It is Christ in you, the hope of glory|Gad did waahn dem nuo umoch im riili riili bles unu — unu piipl we kom fram aal bout. Da mesij ya se Krais Jiizas liv iina unu aat, an unu kyan luk fi kom si an nuo ou Gad big an powaful.

whom we preach, warning everyone and teaching everyone in all wisdom, so that we may present them perfect in Christ Jesus. |Wi pred di mesij bout im. Wi waan piipl an tiich piipl bout wa dem no fi du an wa dem fi du. Wen wi waan an tiich, wi yuuz aal a di sens dem we Gad gi wi. An wi du aal a dis ya so evribadi kyan kom kluos tu Krais Jiizas, an kyan kom ton ou Gad waahn dem fi ton, an no shaat a notn wen wi tek dem go infronta Gad.
In this labor, striving according to His power, which effectively works in me.|A dis mi a wok fa. Mi a wok aad aad. Mi onggl kyan du dis kaaz Krais Jiizas gi mi powa fi du it.

I would like you to know what a great struggle I am having for you, and for those at Laodicea, and for everyone who has not seen my face in the flesh|Mi waahn unu nuo ou aad mi a wok fi unu, an fi di piipl dem we de iina Leyodiisiya an fi aal a uu neva miit mi yet an no nuo wa mi luk laik.

that their hearts may be comforted, being knit together in love, and receive all the riches and assurance of full understanding, and knowledge of the mystery of God, both of the Father and of Christ|Mi a wok aad, so dat unu aat no jrap wen unu kom kraas prablem, an dat unu kyan kom tugeda an lov unu wan aneda. Da wie de Gad wi bles unu an mek unu get fi nuo an riili andastan di chuu mesij — di mesij bout Gad siikrit, an Gad siikrit a Krais Jiizas.

in whom are hidden all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge.|A im wan kyan mek unu andastan di chrezha dem we Gad did aid. Dem chrezha de wi mek unu waiz an kyan andastan, an riili nuo bout Gad. Kaaz a iina Krais Jiizas dem chrezha de de.

Now this I say lest anyone beguile you with enticing words. |Mi tel unu dis so nobadi kyaahn kom fuul unu op tu ou dem taak, an mek unu go chrie. Wa dem se mait-a soun laik dem mek sens bot a pie lai.

For though I am absent in the flesh, yet I am with you in spirit, rejoicing and seeing your orderliness and the steadfastness of your faith in Christ.|Kaaz iivn duo mi mait no riili de wich paat unu de, mi spirit de de wid unu siem wie. An mi api fi si se aal a unu tugeda, a tan op chrang an a chos iina Krais Jiizas.
As you have received Christ Jesus the Lord, so walk in Him|Sins unu tek Krais Jiizas fi unu Laad, unu fi liv laik sumadi we kluos tu im.

rooted and built up in Him and established in the faith, as you have been taught, and abounding with thanksgiving.|So, jos laik ou chrii ruut de diip iina grong, a so fi unu ruut fi beri diip dong iina im. An jos laik ou bildin tan op pan sopm, a im unu fi bil unu laif pan. Dat miin se unu fi dipen pan im muo an muo an du wa im tel unu fi du. Unu fi uol aan chrang an gwaan chos iina im jos laik ou wi did tiich unu fi du. An no figet fi gi Faada Gad tangks aal di taim.

Beware lest anyone captivate you through philosophy and vain deceit, in the tradition of men and the elementary principles of the world, and not after Christ.|Wach unuself! No mek nobadi chrap unu wid aagiment we onggl soun laik se dem mek sens, bot we no riili mek no sens at aal. Nuo! No mek dem tek unu ton no sliev. Dem aagiment de dis a taak bout ou piipl tingk bout sortn tingz, an bout wa faada tiich dem pikni, an we dem pikni de kom tiich fi dem pikni. Dem sitn de jos diil wid ou piipl luk pan di worl, an a jos taak bout powaful spirit we iina di worl. Dem no av notn fi du wid di chuu mesij bout Krais Jiizas.

For in Him lives all the fullness of the Godhead bodily.|Uu Jiizas bi no difrant fram uu Gad bi. Eniting we mek Gad Gad, de iina Jiizas tu, an aal wen im did de iina man faam im did tan siem laik Gad.

And you are complete in Him, who is the head of all authority and power.|Unu fi wach out tu, kaaz Gad mek unu liv fi riil kaa unu kluos tu Krais Jiizas. Unu no niid notn els kaa evri spirit we av powa an a ruul, a Jiizas ruul uova dem.

In Him you were also circumcised with the circumcision made without hands, by putting off the body of the sins of the flesh, by the circumcision of Christ|An kaa unu kluos tu Jiizas im sorkomsaiz unu. Unu no sorkomsaiz laik naamal, laik wen piipl kot we skin fi shuo se dem a Gad piipl. Nuo sa, im kot unu we fram sin. So sin naa no muo powa uova unu.

buried with Him in baptism, in which also you were raised with Him through the faith of the power of God, who has raised Him from the dead.|An wen unu did get baptaiz, a laik se unu did ded an beri wid Krais Jiizas. An a laik se Gad mek unu liv agen tu wen Jiizas kom bak alaiv. Im du dat jos kaaz unu chos iina im powa. A im tek we Jiizas fram mongks ded piipl an mek im kom bak alaiv.

And you, being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh, He has resurrected together with Him, having forgiven you all sins. |Wan taim unu did ded. Unu spirit did ded, an unu neehn kot we fram sin yet. So sin did stil av powa uova unu dem taim de. Bot Gad mek Krais Jiizas gi unu laif. Im paadn wi fi aal a wi sin dem.

He blotted out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us and contrary to us, and He took it out of the way, nailing it to the cross. |Im tier op aal we di Laa se wi uo, an niel dem pan di kraas. Im niel it op an muuv it outa wi wie, wen im did ded pan di kraas. An siek-a wa apm tu im, wi no afi pie fi notn agen.

And having disarmed authorities and powers, He made a show of them openly, triumphing over them by the cross.|An so, im tek we di powa fram aal a di spirit dem we did a ruul an we did av powa, an shiem dem infronta evribadi. A biit im biit dem wen im ded pan di kraas.

Therefore let no one judge you regarding food, or drink, or in respect of a holy day or new moon or sabbath days.|So no mek nobadi joj non a unu an rait unu aaf siek-a wa unu nyam ar jringk. An no pie dem no main wen dem kom a tel unu bout no speshal uoli die we kom evri ier wen piipl worship Gad, ar bout di Nyuu Muun Festival ar wan Sabat die.

These are shadows of things to come, but the substance belongs to Christ. |Aal a dem ruul de, dem no notn laik di sitn dem we a-go kom. Dem a onggl laik wan sheda fi dem sitn de; dem a no di riil ting. Wa riil, a Krais Jiizas.

Do not let anyone cheat you of your reward by delighting in false humility and the worship of angels, dwelling on those things which he has not seen, vainly arrogant due to his unspiritual mind|No fala nobadi we waahn mek unu fiil bad kaaz dem se unu no worship Gad ou unu fi worship im. Dem gwaan an gwaan bout ou unu fi ombl unuself, an bout ou unu fi worship ienjel. No lisn dem. Dem dis a chat a galang bout wa dem kliem se dem si iina vijan. Bot dem a buos an dem no av notn fi buos bout siek-a dem worliyan main.

and not supporting the head, from which the entire body, nourished and knit together by joints and sinews, grows as God gives the increase.|Jiizas Krais a di ed, an dem no diil wid di ed no muo. A di ed kanchuol di badi. An di uol badi dipen pan it. Di ed mek di jaint an di mosl dem kom tugeda, an a dem uol op di badi. A dat mek evri paat a di badi wok tugeda, an so di badi gruo ou Gad waahn it fi gruo.

Therefore, if you died with Christ to the elementary principles of the world, why, as if you were living in the world, do you subject yourself to legalistic rules?|Sins Krais Jiizas ded pan di kraas, di spirit dem we ruul iina da worl ya naa no muo kanchuol uova unu. So sins unu did ded wid im, wa mek unu a liv laik se unu bilang tu da worl ya — a fala fi dem ruul an a du wa dem se?
“Do not touch! Do not taste! Do not handle!” |“No uol op uol op dat!”, “No toch dis!” Ar “No ties dat!”

These all are to perish with use and are aligned with the commandments and doctrines of men.|Aal a dem ruul ya a taak bout fuud an jringk we onggl yuuz wan taim an we no wot notn afta dat. An unu no fi fala dem ruul ya, kaaz a jos piipl mek dem op an tiich dem.

These things have indeed a show of wisdom in self-imposed worship and humility and neglecting of the body, but are worthless against the indulgence of the flesh.|Iivn duo dem ruul ya mait-a soun laik se dem mek gud sens, dem push piipl fi worship di wie ou di piipl dem we mek di ruul dem kom tugeda an se piipl fi worship; dem presha piipl fi gwaan laik se dem ombl; an dem push dem fi anggl dem badi bad — bout a sorv dem a sorv Gad wen dem du dat. Dem ruul ya mait-a luk laik se dem mek sens, bot dem no wot a ting. Dem no elp nobadi fi tan op chrang gens di rang sitn dem we di badi waahn, an fi elp dem kip we fram aal a dem sitn de.

If you then were raised with Christ, desire those things which are above, where Christ sits at the right hand of God.|Sins Gad mek unu liv agen wen Krais Jiizas did kom bak alaiv, unu fi kip unu main an aat pan di sitn dem we de iina evn. A dem sitn de unu fi waahn. A de-so Krais Jiizas de. An im a sidong pan Gad rait an said.
Set your affection on things above, not on things on earth.|So, unu fi gwaan tingk bout di sitn dem we de iina evn, an no bout di sitn dem we de ya-so pan ort.

For you are dead, and your life is hidden with Christ in God. |Unu du dat, kaaz unu did ded an unu a-go liv wid Krais Jiizas. Unu riili a liv, duo unu no andastan bout it yet. Unu a-go liv kaa unu an Krais Jiizas kluos an Krais Jiizas an Gad kluos tu.

When Christ who is our life shall appear, then you also shall appear with Him in glory.|A Krais Jiizas mek unu riili liv. Wen im kom bak piipl a-go si an nuo ou big an powaful im bi. Dem a-go si an nuo uu unu bi tu, kaa unu a-go de de wid im.

Therefore put to death the parts of your earthly nature: sexual immorality, uncleanness, inordinate affection, evil desire, and covetousness, which is idolatry. |Eniting we insaida unu we bilang tu da worl ya — dash it we! Mi a taak laik seks sin, an ou unu mait-a lang fi go miks op unuself iina dem sitn de. Unu mait-a no tap tingk bout dem, an waahn fi go du dem so til unu galang go du dem. Bot dem de no kliin. Unu fi dash we dat! Plos aal a di sitn dem we unu waahn waahn we no rait; plos di wikid sitn dem we unu waahn fi du. Unu fi klier dem outa unu laif! Kil dem! An unu no fi waahnti-waahnti niida; aal waahn waahn tingz we unu no niid! Wen unu du dat, a worship unu a worship dem sitn de insted-a unu a worship Gad.
Because of these things, the wrath of God comes on the sons of disobedience.|Siek-a aal a dem sitn ya, Gad beks bad an im a-go ponish aal a uu a miks op iina dem an naa fala wa im se.
You also once walked in these, when you lived in them. |A so unu did liv wan taim, wen dem sitn de yuus tu kanchuol unu.

But now you must also put away all these: anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, and filthy language out of your mouth.|Bot nou, unu fi get rid a aal a dem sitn ya: no get beks an get so mad dat unu kyaahn iivn kanchuol unuself. No kip malis niida, an no chat bad bout piipl an tier dem dong. An no mek no doti wod kom outa unu mout niida.
Do not lie one to another, since you have put off the old nature with its deeds|No lai tu unu wan aneda, kaaz unu don wid di uol taim laif nou, an so unu naa du di sitn dem we unu yuus tu du agen.

and have embraced the new nature, which is renewed in knowledge after the image of Him who created it|Unu a nyuu sumadi nou. An Gad a mek unu komiin muo an muo laik im. Da wie de unu kyan riili get fi nuo im — di wan we mek unu, an we mek evriting els.

where there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcision nor uncircumcision, barbarian, Scythian, slave nor free, but Christ is all and in all.|Siek-a dat, wi no av Juu piipl difrant fram piipl we a no Juu. Wi no av piipl we sorkomsaiz difrant fram di wan dem we no sorkomsaiz. Wi no kaal nobadi wail, farina piipl, an wi no av sliev difrant fram piipl we frii. Kaaz rait ya nou, Krais Jiizas a aal wi bizniz bout, an im iina aal a wi we a liv da nyuu laif ya.

So embrace, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, a spirit of mercy, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, and longsuffering.|So laik ou unu a Gad piipl we im pik an we im riili lov, unu aat mos muuv insaida unu fi ada piipl. Unu fi kain tu dem an unu fi ombl. Unu fi jengkl an unu mos tek taim wid piipl.

Bear with one another and forgive one another. If anyone has a quarrel against anyone, even as Christ forgave you, so you must do.|No mata wa apm, unu fi bier wid unu wan aneda, an paadn unu wan aneda no mata wa dem du. Paadn unu wan aneda, jos laik ou di Laad did paadn unu. Put aan aal a we mi a tel unu nou, laik se a kluoz unu a put aan.

And above all these things, embrace love, which is the bond of perfection.|An pan tap a aal a wa mi se, unu fi put aan lov. A lov bring di uol a dem tugeda laik se dem a onggl wan sitn — an a so it fi go.

Let the peace of God, to which also you are called in one body, rule in your hearts. And be thankful.|Krais Jiizas gi unu piis. So mek di piis we im gi unu tek kanchuol a unu aat. Im kaal unu fi kom liv iina piis wid unu wan aneda laik ou a di uol a unu kom tugeda an mek op di wan badi. An gi Gad tangks tu.

Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom, teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord. |An unu fi gwaan mek di mesij bout Krais Jiizas liv iina unu aat an bles unu iina evri wie. So tiich an waan unu wan aneda. Du it laik unu av sens, an du it wid Saamz, di im dem an di sang dem we Gad Spirit gi unu fi sing. Sing tu Faada Gad wid aal a unu aat an gi im tangks.

And whatever you do in word or deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God the Father through Him.|An no mata wa unu du: no mata wa unu se ar du, unu fi memba se unu a di Laad Jiizas falara, so du wa unu du laik sumadi we a fala im. Wen unu a du dat, unu wi a gi Faada Gad tangks. An unu wi kyan gi im tangks, siek-a wa Krais Jiizas du fi unu.
Wives, submit yourselves to your own husbands, as it is fitting in the Lord.|Aal unu we a waif, unu fi lisn unu ozban, rispek im an nuo se a im inchaaj, kaaz a dat di Laad waahn unu fi du.
Husbands, love your wives, and do not be bitter toward them.|Di ozban dem, unu fi lov unu waif; no chriit dem bad an gwaan laik se dem a unu sliev.
Children, obey your parents in all things, for this is well pleasing to the Lord.|Pikni, unu fi ier wa unu mada an faada se unu fi du, kaaz a dat di Laad lov.

Fathers, do not provoke your children to anger, lest they be discouraged.|Aal a unu we a faada an mada, unu no fi faas faas wid unu pikni dem an se pie bad sitn bout aal a we dem du. Dat wi mek dem aat jrap an mek dem no waahn fi du notn at aal.

Servants, obey your masters in all things according to the flesh, serving not only when they are watching, as the servants of men, but in singleness of heart, fearing God.|An sliev, unu maasta dem we de ya pan ort, unu fi lisn dem an du aal we dem se unu fi du. An no du dat onggl wen dem a wach unu ar jos kaaz unu waahn fi mek piipl api wid unu. Nuo! Unu fi riili lisn wa dem se an du wa dem se unu fi du ef dem a wach ar ef dem naa wach. Unu fi du dat kaaz unu a du wa rait iina unu aat an unu rispek Gad.
And whatever you do, do it heartily, as for the Lord and not for men|Wat-eva unu a du, du it wid aal a unu aat; wok laik se a Gad unu a wok fa an no fi piipl.
knowing that from the Lord you will receive the reward of the inheritance. For you serve the Lord Christ.
column2: Kaaz unu nuo se unu a-go get wa di Laad pramis fi gi unu fi aal a di sitn dem we unu du. Kaaz a im unu riili a wok fa.

column1: But he who does wrong will receive for the wrong which he has done, and there is no partiality.|Az fi di wan dem we du rang, Gad a-go gi dem bak sitn fi aal a di rang we dem du. Im no kier a uu dem.

Masters, give to your servants that which is just and fair, knowing that you also have a Master in heaven.|Az fi unu we uon sliev, unu fi chriit unu sliev rait an unu fi chriit dem fier. Kaaz unu nuo se unu av wan maasta iina evn tu.
Continue in prayer, and be watchful with thanksgiving|No tap prie. Unu fi wach out an get unu main redi fi akshan an gi Gad tangks wen unu a prie.

while praying also for us, that God would open to us a door of utterance to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in chains|An beg unu du, prie fi wi tu. Prie se Gad wi klier di wie, so wi kyan pred di siikrit mesij bout Krais Jiizas — di mesij we nobadi neehn nuo bout. A siek-a da mesij ya dem chien mi op an av mi a prizn ya-so nou.
that I may reveal it clearly, as I ought to speak. |Prie se mi wi get fi mek di piipl dem nuo bout da mesij ya, an dat mi wi kyan tel dem it plien plien so dem kyan andastan. Kaaz a dat mi fi du.

Walk in wisdom toward those who are outside, wisely using the opportunity. |Unu fi gwaan laik se unu av sens wen unu roun piipl we a no Krais Jiizas falara. No wies no taim, evri chaans unu get unu fi du dat.

Let your speech always be with grace, seasoned with salt, that you may know how you should answer everyone.|Taak tu piipl nais, an mek dem waahn fi iina wa unu a se jos siek-a ou unu taak. Siizn op unu aagiment wid saalt, so dem waahn fi ier muo an muo bout wa unu a se. An unu fi nuo ou fi ansa evribadi tu.

Tychicus, who is a beloved brother and a faithful minister and fellow servant in the Lord, will tell you all the news about me.|Taikikos, a wi gud gud breda. Im eva a chos iina Gad. Wi lov im. Im a wok fi di Laad jos laik wi. Im wi tel unu aal a wa a apm tu mi.

I have sent him to you for this very purpose, that he might know your circumstances and comfort your hearts|Mi sen im tu unu so im kyan tel unu ou wi a du, an elp push unu fi gwaan an mek unu fiil api agen.

with Onesimus, a faithful and beloved brother, who is one of you. They will make known to you everything which is happening here.|Im a kom wid Oniisimos, wi gud gud breda we wi lov tu, an we eva chos iina Gad. Im a wan a unu. Di tuu a dem wi mek unu nuo wa a gwaan uova ya-so.

Aristarchus my fellow prisoner greets you, with Mark, the cousin of Barnabas (concerning whom you received instructions: If he comes to you, receive him)|Ieristaakos we de iina prizn wid mi, im sen oudi. Baanabas kozn, Maak, se oudi tu. Mi tel unu bout Maak aredi, so ef im kom tu unu, welkom im.

and Jesus, who is called Justus. These are my only fellow workers for the kingdom of God who are of the circumcision. They have been a comfort to me.|An Jiizas, we piipl kaal Jostos, im sen oudi tu. Dem chrii man ya a di onggl Juu we a wok wid mi fi get piipl fi staat fala Gad an tek im fi dem king an mek im ruul uova dem. An bwai, dem elp an push mi uol iip.

Epaphras greets you. He is one of you, a servant of Christ, always laboring fervently for you in prayers, that you may stand mature and complete in the entire will of God.|Epafras, we kom fram mongks unu, an we a wan a Krais Jiizas sorvant dem, im se oudi tu. Im eva a prie fi unu wid aal a im aat. Im prie se unu wi tan op chrang iina Gad an no tap chos iina im. Im prie se unu wi biliiv iina Gad so til nobadi kyaahn mek unu tap chos iina im. An im prie aad se unu wi nuo fi shuor wa Gad waahn unu fi du an fi biliiv.

I bear witness of him, that he has a great zeal for you, those who are in Laodicea, and those in Hierapolis.|Mi fi wan kyan tel unu ou aad im wok fi unu an fi di piipl dem we de a Leyodiisiya an Ierapolis.
Luke, the beloved physician, and Demas greet you.|Wi gud gud fren Luuk, di dakta — im an Diimas sen oudi tu.

Greet the brothers who are in Laodicea, and Nympha, and the church which is in his house.|Tel di breda an sista dem a Leyodiisiya se mi se oudi. Tel Nimfa oudi an Gad piipl dem we miit op an av choch a ar yaad.

When this epistle is read among you, ensure that it is read also in the church of the Laodiceans, and that you, likewise, read the epistle from Laodicea.|Afta sumadi riid da leta ya tu unu, mek shuor se sumadi riid it fi di piipl dem a Leyodiisiya we biliiv iina Gad. An unu fi riid di leta we mi sen go gi dem.
Tell Archippus, “Make sure that you fulfill the ministry which you have received in the Lord.”|Tel Aakipos dis fi mi, “Mek shuor se yu don di wok we di Laad gi yu fi du, kaaz a im ya'a wok fa.”

I, Paul, write this greeting with my own hand. Remember my chains. Grace be with you. Amen.|Dis a mi, Paal. Mi a rait an tel unu oudi wid mi uona an. Memba se mi chien op iina jiel.Mi prie se Gad wi lov unu iivn duo wi no dizorv it.

Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God,To the saints who are at Ephesus and to the faithful in Christ Jesus:|Mi a Paal. Gad pik mi fi bi wan a Jiizas Krais apasl, kaaz a dat im did waahn. Mi a rait da leta ya tu aal a Gad piipl we de iina Efisos an we riili chos iina Jiizas.
Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.|Mi a prie se Faada Gad an wi Laad Jiizas Krais, wi shuo unu lov iivn duo wi no dizorv it an gi unu piis iina unu aat.

Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ|Wi priez Gad. Im a di Gad an Faada fi wi Laad Jiizas Krais. Kaaz wi an Krais Jiizas a wan, Faada Gad mek wi spirit api an mek wi kyan tek paat iina evriting gud we kom fram evn.

just as He chose us in Him before the foundation of the world, to be holy and blameless before Him in love|Fram wie bak wen, bifuo Gad mek di worl, im pik wi an mek wi an Jiizas wan. Im pik wi, so dat wi kyan liv kliin an no av notn bad iina wi laif fi kip wi we fram im. Siek-a ou im lov wi

He predestined us to adoption as sons to Himself through Jesus Christ according to the good pleasure of His will|im mek op im main fram wie bak wen se im wuda tek wi fi im pikni dem, siek-a wa Jiizas Krais wuda du. A dat im did waahn an it mek im api.
to the praise of the glory of His grace which He graciously bestowed on us in the Beloved.
column2: Im du aal dem sopm ya so dat wi wuda priez im fi ou im gud an kain tu wi. An im shuo wi ou im gud an kain tu wi wen im sen Jiizas tu wi.

column1: In Him we have redemption through His blood and the forgiveness of sins according to the riches of His grace
column2: Jiizas gi op im laif pan di kraas an fi im blod mek wan wie fi frii wi an paadn wi fram wi sin dem. A chuu Gad gud an kain mek dem sopm ya kyan apm.

column1: which He lavished on us in all wisdom and insight|An im did riili gud an kain tu wi — gud an kain kyaahn don. Pan tap a dat, im mek wi waiz an kyan andastan evriting.

making known to us the mystery of His will, according to His good pleasure, which He purposed in Himself|An kaaz Gad did waahn wi fi nuo, im tel wi aal a im plan dem we nobadi neva nuo bout. Fram di staat, im did mek op im main fi yuuz Jiizas fi du aal a di sitn dem wa im plan.

as a plan for the fullness of time, to unite all things in Christ, which are in heaven and on earth.|Wen Gad mek op im main se di taim rait, im wi mek Jiizas ruul an av powa uova evribadi an uova aal a di sitn dem we iina evn an wa de pan di ort.

In Him also we have received an inheritance, being predestined according to the purpose of Him who works all things according to the counsel of His own will|Gad mek evriting apm jos laik ou im plan dem fi apm, an fram wie bak wen, im pik wi fi bi im piipl siek-a Jiizas an wa im wuda du.

that we, who were the first to hope in Christ, should live for the praise of His glory.|Im pik wi, so dat wi, we a did di fos wan dem fi chos iina Krais Jiizas, wuda kaaz piipl fi priez Gad, wen dem si ou im big an powaful.

In Him you also, after hearing the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation, and after believing in Him, were sealed with the promised Holy Spirit|An wen unu did ier Gad wod — di chuu mesij we siev unu — wen unu biliiv iina Krais Jiizas, Gad gi unu im Uoli Spirit we im did pramis, fi shuo se unu a fi im.

who is the guarantee of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, to the praise of His glory.|Di Uoli Spirit a onggl paat a aal a wa Gad pramis fi gi wi. Wi wi get di ada sitn dem wen im don frii aal a im piipl dem. Im du it da wie de so dat piipl wuda priez im wen dem si ou im big an powaful iina evri wie.

Therefore I also, after hearing of your faith in the Lord Jesus and your love toward all the saints|So nou, siek-a aal a dem sitn ya, fram di fos taim mi ier se unu chos iina di Laad Jiizas an dat unu lov Gad piipl
do not cease giving thanks for you, mentioning you in my prayers|mi no tap gi tangks fi unu wen mi a prie.

so that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of Him|Mi prie se di Gad fi wi Laad Jiizas, di Faada we big an powaful iina evri wie, wi kaaz unu fi waiz an andastan evriting, so dat unu kyan nuo im beta.

that the eyes of your understanding may be enlightened, that you may know what is the hope of His calling and what are the riches of the glory of His inheritance among the saints|Mi prie se Gad wi uopm unu main, so unu kyan andastan di sitn dem we im kaal wi fi tek paat iina. An mi prie se unu wi andastan se di sitn dem we Gad pramis fi gi im piipl dem big an nof.

and what is the surpassing greatness of His power toward us who believe, according to the working of His mighty power|Pan tap a dat, mi prie se unu wi andastan se notn kyaahn mach fi im powa we a wok fi di piipl we chos iina im. Da powa de a di siem chrang chrang powa
which He performed in Christ when He raised Him from the dead and seated Him at His own right hand in the heavenly places
column2: we im yuuz mek Jiizas kom bak alaiv an gi im di tap-a-tap pozishan saida im iina evn.

column1: far above all principalities, and power, and might, and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this age but also in that which is to come|Fram im ai pozishan wich paat im sidong iina evn, Krais Jiizas ruul uova evri spirit we av powa fi ruul iina dem taim ya an iina di worl we a kom.
And He put all things in subjection under His feet and made Him the head over all things for the church
column2: Gad put evriting anda Krais Jiizas fut an gi im powa uova evriting. An Gad mek im di liida fi di choch.

column1: which is His body, the fullness of Him who fills all things in all ways.|Nou, di choch a Jiizas badi. Jiizas gi di choch laif, an a im gi evriting evriwe laif.
And you were dead in your trespasses and sins
column2: Wan taim unu spirit did ded kaaz unu did a brok Gad laa an unu did a liv iina sin.

column1: in which you formerly walked according to the age of this world and according to the prince of the power of the air, the spirit who now works in the sons of disobedience|Dem taim de unu yuus tu du di wikid sitn dem we di worliyan dem du. Unu yuus tu fala di wan we ruul an av powa iina di skai, di spirit we a wok iina di piipl dem we ton we fram wa Gad waahn dem fi du.

among them we all also once lived in the lusts of our flesh, doing the desires of the flesh and of the mind, and we were by nature children of wrath, even as the rest.|Matarafak, aal a wi yuus fi liv laka dat wan taim. Wi did a liv onggl fi wa wi badi waahn an fi di rang sitn dem wa wi main tel wi fi du. Wi did komiin jos laik evribadi els we fi get joj an ponish fi dem sin.
But God, being rich in mercy, because of His great love with which He loved us|Bot chuu Gad gud an kain kyaahn don an siek-a ou im lov wi nof nof

even when we were dead in sins, made us alive together with Christ (by grace you have been saved)|aal wen wi spirit did ded siek-a wi sin dem, Gad mek wi kom bak alaiv siem taim Jiizas did kom bak alaiv. (A kaaz Gad lov unu iivn duo wi no dizorv it mek im siev unu.)

and He raised us up and seated us together in the heavenly places in Christ Jesus|Gad mek wi kom bak alaiv siem taim wid Jiizas, an mek wi sidong wid Jiizas iina evn so wi kyan ruul wid im, kaaz wi an Jiizas a wan.

so that in the coming ages He might show the surpassing riches of His grace in kindness toward us in Christ Jesus.|Gad du aal a dis ya, so dat iina di worl we a-go kom, im kyan shuo evribadi ou im lov wi iivn duo wi no dizorv it an kain tu aal a wi siek-a wa Krais Jiizas du fi wi.

For by grace you have been saved through faith, and this is not of yourselves. It is the gift of God|Gad siev unu kaaz im lov unu iivn duo wi no dizorv it, an kaaz unu chos iina im. A no siek-a notn we unu du mek im siev unu. Di nyuu laif we Gad gi unu a wan prezent.
not of works, so that no one should boast.|Nobadi kyaahn brag an buos se Gad siev dem siek-a wa dem du.

For we are His workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God prepared beforehand, so that we should walk in them.|A Gad mek wi tan ou wi tan. Gad mek wi an Jiizas wan, so wi kyan du di gud sitn dem we im did plan fi wi du fram wie bak wen.

Therefore remember that formerly you, the Gentiles in the flesh, who are called the “uncircumcision” by the so-called “circumcision” in the flesh by human hands|“Piipl we no sorkomsaiz,” a dat di Juu dem kaal piipl we neva baan Juu. Di Juu dem kaal demself “piipl we sorkomsaiz,” kaaz fi dem faada sorkomsaiz dem wen dem sumaal, fi shuo se dem a Gad piipl. So memba

were at that time apart from Christ, alienated from the citizenship of Israel and strangers to the covenants of promise, without hope and without God in the world.|se wan taim, unu neva nou Krais Jiizas, unu a neva paat a Gad piipl, Izrel, an unu kudn kip kompni wid dem niida. Di diil we Gad mek wid im piipl neehn av notn fi du wid unu. Unu did iina di worl, unu neva did a liv fi notn an unu neva nuo Gad.
But now in Christ Jesus you who were formerly far away have been brought near by the blood of Christ.|Bot, siek-a Jiizas Krais blod, unu we did de faar fram Gad no de faar agen.

For He is our peace, who has made both groups one and has broken down the barrier of the dividing wall|Wan taim, piipl we a Juu an piipl we a no Juu did iet dem wan aneda. Bot nou, Jiizas mek di tuu a dem liv laik wan. Im brok dong di iet we dem did fiil an we did a kip dem fram wan aneda. It did komiin laik wan stuon waal. Nou, dem kyan liv tugeda, kaaz Jiizas tek di tuu a dem an mek dem iina wan gruup a piipl.

by abolishing in His flesh the enmity, that is, the law of the ­commandments contained in ordinances, that in Himself He might make the two into one new man, thus making peace|An im du dat, wen im ded pan di kraas an tek we di Laa wid di ruul dem, so wi no afi fala dem no muor. Im du dat, so dat, wid im uona laif, im kuda mek piis mongks piipl we a Juu an piipl we a no Juu, an so dat im kuda ton dem iina wan gruup a piipl.

and that He might reconcile both to God into one body through the cross, thereby slaying the enmity|Wen Jiizas ded pan di kraas, im put di tuu gruup a piipl dem tugeda an im mek tingz rait bitwiin dem an Gad. A so kom im mek dem tap iet dem wan aneda.
And He came and preached peace to you who were far away and peace to those who were near.
column2: So Jiizas Krais kom kom priich di Gud Nyuuz bout ou piipl kyan av piis wid Gad. Im priich tu di Juu dem we a Gad piipl an tu piipl we a no Juu we neehn nuo Gad.

column1: For through Him we both have access by one Spirit to the Father.|Siek-a Krais Jiizas, di Uoli Spirit mek aal a wi kyan go tu Faada Gad.

Now, therefore, you are no longer strangers and foreigners, but are fellow citizens with the saints and members of the household of God|So den, unu a no chrienja an farina no muor. Nou unu a paat a Gad piipl an unu bilang tu Gad fambili.

having been built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ Himself being the chief cornerstone|Unu komiin laik wan bildin. Jos laik ou bildin mek pan foundieshan, a siem so unu av wan foundieshan. Fi unu foundieshan a di apasl an prafit dem. An Krais Jiizas a di rakstuon we uol di bildin tugeda.
in whom the entire building, tightly framed together, grows into a holy temple in the Lord|An a im bil op di bildin iina wan ous fi di Laad.

in whom you also are being built together into a dwelling place of God through the Spirit.|So, unu piipl we a no Juu, kaaz unu chos iina Jiizas, Gad a bil op unu an di Juu dem we chos iina Jiizas. Im a bil unu op tugeda fi faam wan ous we Gad Spirit liv iina.
For this reason I, Paul, am the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles.|Krais Jiizas mek mi, Paal, im prizna, so mi kuda priich tu unu we a no Juu.

You may have heard of the administration of the grace of God which was given me for you|Nou, mi shuor se unu ier aredi ou Gad lov mi iivn duo mi no dizorv it. Im pik mi fi da speshal wok ya — fi priich tu unu we a no Juu.

how by revelation He made known to me the mystery, as I have written briefly already|Unu nuo ou Gad mek mi nuo bout im siikrit mesij, we nobadi neehn nuo bout bifuo. Mi no tuu lang rait likl bit bout it.
by which, when you read it, you may understand my knowledge of the mystery of Christ|Wen unu riid wa mi rait, unu wi andastan wa mi nuo bout di siikrit mesij bout Krais Jiizas.

which in other generations was not made known to the sons of men, as it is now revealed to His holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit|Gad neehn shuo da siikrit ya tu piipl bifuo nou. Bot iina dem taim ya, im mek di Uoli Spirit tel im piipl dem we im pik fi bi im apasl an prafit dem bout di siikrit.

how the Gentiles are fellow heirs, and fellow members, and partakers of the promise in Christ by the gospel.|Di siikrit mesij a dat wen piipl we a no Juu biliiv iina di Gud Nyuuz, dem ton Gad pikni an tek paat iina aal a di gud sitn dem Gad gi di Juu piipl dem. Pan tap a dat, aal a dem jain op tugeda wid di Izrel piipl dem we bilang tu Gad, an siek-a wa Jiizas du, dem gweehn get aal a wa Gad pramis fi gi im piipl dem.

Of this I was made a minister, according to the gift of the grace of God given to me by the effective working of His power.|Siek-a ou Gad lov mi iivn duo mi no dizorv it, im yuuz im powa an pik mi fi gi mi da wok ya fi tel piipl bout di Gud Nyuuz.

To me, the very least of all saints, this grace was given, to preach to the Gentiles the incomprehensible riches of Christ|Iivn duo mi no impuotant laik di res a Gad piipl dem, Gad shuo mi lov iivn duo mi no dizorv it an pik mi fi priich tu di piipl dem we a no Juu an fi tel dem bout di nais sitn dem we Krais Jiizas gi im piipl. Dem sitn de so big dat nobadi kyaahn figa dem out.

and to reveal for all people what is the fellowship of the mystery, which from the beginning of the ages has been hidden in God, who created all things through Jesus Christ|Gad mek evriting an a im pik mi fi mek evribadi nuo bout im siikrit plan an ou di plan a-go wok out. Im did aid di plan fram evribadi, fram wie bak wen.

so that now the manifold wisdom of God might be made known by the church to the principalities and powers in the heavenly places|Gad du aal a dis so dat, iina dem taim ya, di choch wuda shuo di spirit dem we ruul an we av nof powa iina di skai, ou Gad riili riili waiz.
according to the eternal purpose which He completed in Christ Jesus our Lord|A so Gad did plan it fi apm fram wie bak wen, an im mek Krais Jiizas wi laad mek it apm siem laik ou im did plan it.
in whom we have boldness and confident access through faith in Him|Siek-a Jiizas an kaaz wi chos iina im, im mek wi kyan kom tu Gad frii an no fried a notn.

Therefore I ask you not to lose heart at my tribulations for you, which is your glory.|So, mi a beg unu, no bada fiil bad an fiil laik se unu waahn fi gi op, siek-a ou mi a sofa. No du dat, kaaz wa mi a sofa a fi unu uona gud.
For this reason I bow my knees to the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ|Sins mi nuo aal a dis, mi go dong pan mi nii an prie tu faada Gad.
from whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named
column2: A im mek evribadi we de a evn an aal uu de pan ort.

column1: that He would give you, according to the riches of His glory, power to be strengthened by His Spirit in the inner man|Gad powaful an im gud an kain kyaahn don, so mi prie se im Spirit wi mek unu chrang.

and that Christ may dwell in your hearts through faith; that you, being rooted and grounded in love|Chuu unu chos iina Krais Jiizas, mi prie se im wi liv iina unu aat. Unu tan chrang iina Gad lov jos laik ou chrii tan op chrang wen dem ruut gaan dong diip iina di grong. Siek-a dat
may be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth and length and depth and height
column2: mi prie se unu an di res a Gad piipl wi kyan andastan Krais Jiizas lov — im lov we big an braad laik di sii an im lov we so nof it riich di skai.

column1: and to know the love of Christ which surpasses knowledge; that you may be filled with all the fullness of God.|Mi prie se unu wi nuo bout Krais Jiizas lov iivn duo nobadi kyaahn figa out umoch im riili riili lov wi. Wen unu nuo bout Krais lov, Gad wi tek kanchuol a unu laif iina evri wie so til unu komiin jos laik im.

Now to Him who is able to do exceedingly abundantly beyond all that we ask or imagine, according to the power that works in us|Tangks an priez tu di muos powaful Gad! Im kyan du nof nof muor dan wa wi kyan tingk bout an nof muo dan wa wi kyan aks im fa, kaaz a fi im powa a wok iina wi laif!
to Him be the glory in the church and in Christ Jesus throughout all generations, forever and ever. Amen.|Mek evribadi we bilang tu Jiizas, priez Gad fi eva an eva. Iemen!

I, therefore, the prisoner of the Lord, exhort you to walk in a manner worthy of the calling with which you were called.|So den, mi we de a prizn kaaz mi a sorv di Laad, a beg unu — unu we Gad pik fi bi im piipl; mi a beg unu fi liv ou Gad waahn unu fi liv.

With all humility, meekness, and patience, bearing with one another in love|Ombl unuself an lorn fi tek taim wid unu wan aneda. No bada rof op nobadi. Insted-a dat, aalwiez shuo lov wen unu a diil wid unu wan aneda. No kwik fi get beks.
be eager to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.
column2: Di Uoli Spirit mek di uol a unu ton wan. So du unu bes an mek shuor se unu liv gud wid unu wan aneda.

column1: There is one body and one Spirit, even as you were called in one hope of your calling|Aal a wi a wan badi an a onggl wan Uoli Spirit de, we liv iina wi. Gad kaal aal a wi tu im di siem wie. An aal a wi we Gad kaal a luk fi get di siem sitn fram im we im kaal wi fa.
one Lord, one faith, one baptism|A onggl wan Laad Jiizas Krais de. Aal a wi biliiv wan chuut an aal a wi get baptaiz fi wan riizn.

one God and Father of all, who is above all, and through all, and in you all.|A onggl wan Gad de an a im a Faada fi evribadi, a im ruul uova evribadi, a im mek evribadi fi du im wok, an a im shuo imself iina evribadi.
But grace was given to each one of us according to the measure of the gift of Christ.
column2: Krais Jiizas gi evri wan a wi wan speshal gif fi wi spirit. Dat shuo umoch im lov wi iivn duo wi no dizorv it.

column1: Therefore He says:“When He ascended on high,He led captivity captive,and gave gifts to men.”|A dat mek it rait dong iina Gad wod se:“Wen im go op a di ai ai plies,im tek di piipl we a priznaan mek dem fala baka iman im gi nof gud sitn tu piipl.”

(In saying, “He ascended,” what does it mean but that He also descended first into the lower parts of the earth?|(Wen taim it se dat “Im go op a wan ai ai plies,” we dat miin? It no miin se im go dong iina di diip diip paat a di ort fos bifuo im go bak op?

He who descended is also He who ascended far above all the heavens that He might fill all things.)|Di siem wan we go dong iina di diip paat a di ort, a im siem wan go op a di ai ai plies, ai op muor dan di skai. Im du dat, so dat im kuda ruul di uol worl.)

He gave some to be apostles, prophets, evangelists, pastors, and teachers|A im siem wan tek som a im piipl dem mek dem ton apasl. Im mek som ton prafit an im sen som fi go roun an priich di gud nyuuz. Im mek som ton paasn an tiicha.
for the equipping of the saints, for the work of service, and for the building up of the body of Christ|Im du aal a dis ya fi get Gad piipl redi fi du Gad wok an fi elp di choch fi gruo chrang

until we all come into the unity of the faith and of the knowledge of the Sonof God, into a complete man, to the measure of the stature of the fullness of Christ|chrang, so til di uol a wi ton wan; wan, kaaz aal a wi chos iina Gad Bwai Pikni iina di siem wie, an aal a wi gruo op an biyiev jos laik im.

so we may no longer be children, tossed here and there by waves and carried about with every wind of doctrine by the trickery of men, by craftiness with deceitful scheming.|Wen da taim de kom, wi naa go komiin laik likl pikni we iizi fi get fuul op. Wi naa go komiin laik wan likl buot we di sii pich aal bout, ar we briiz bluo aal uova di plies. No laiyad, jinal tiicha kyaahn kom chrik wi ar fuul wi op.

But, speaking the truth in love, we may grow up in all things into Him, who is the head, Christ Himself|Insted-a gwaan laik se wi a pikni, mek wi taak bout di chuu mesij bout Jiizas an mek wi liv laik ou di mesij se wi fi liv. An mek wi du it wid lov iina wi aat. Da wie de, wi wi gruo op chrang iina aal saat a wie an get fi komiin laik Krais Jiizas, di wan we a di ed fi di choch.

from whom the whole body is joined together and connected by every joint and ligament, as every part effectively does its work and grows, building itself up in love.|Di ed kanchuol di difrant paat dem pan di badi. An di jaint dem mek di difrant badi paat dem kanek op iina wan fi faam wan badi. Ef aal a di paat dem pan di badi du wa dem fi du, di badi wi gruo chrang. A siem so it go iina di choch. Wen evribadi du we dem supuoz fi du, di piipl dem iina di choch wi gruo chrang wid lov iina dem aat.

Therefore this I say and testify in the Lord, that from now on you walk not as other Gentiles walk, in the vanity of their minds|So, lisn nou! Mi a Gad sorvant so mi av di rait fi tel unu wa unu fi du. Unu no fi liv no muo laik di piipl dem we no nuo Gad. We dem piipl de main tel dem fi du no mek no sens.

having their understanding darkened, excluded from the life of God through the ignorance that is within them, due to the hardness of their hearts.|Dem kyaahn andastan notn, an dem no av no lat an paat iina di nyuu laif we Gad gi, kaaz dem no nuo bout Gad. An dem no nou notn bout Gad, kaaz dem ton dem main gens im.

Being calloused they have given themselves over to sensuality for the practice of every kind of impurity with greediness.|Dem no kier bout we rait ar rang no muo, kaaz dem no av no shiem. Dem eva waahn fi du di sitn dem we dem badi waahn — aal saat a naasi an wikid sitn. Dem jos kyaahn satisfai. Di muo dem du rang, a di muo rang dem waahn fi du.
But you did not learn about Christ in this manner
column2: Bot unu nuo se di wie dem a liv no lain op wid wa wi tiich unu bout Jiizas Krais.

column1: if indeed you have heard Him and have been taught by Him, as the truth is in Jesus: |Mi shuor se wa unu ier bout im, an wa unu lorn bout im, a di chuu mesij bout im.

that you put off the former way of life in the old nature, which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts|Unu lorn se unu fi don we wid di uol laif we unu yuus tu liv an aal a di woklis sitn dem unu yuus tu du, wen unu neva did a fala Jiizas. Dem taim de, unu did lov di wikid sitn dem we onggl did a mash op unu laif.
and be renewed in the spirit of your mind;
column2: Unu lorn ou fi kanchuol unu spirit an unu main fi tingk iina wan nyuu wie.

column1: and that you put on the new nature, which was created according to God in righteousness and true holiness.|An unu lorn fi liv laik wan nyuu sumadi we Gad mek aal uova agen. Gad mek unu fi tan jos laik im — fi du wa rait an wa gud an kliin azkaadn tu di chuut.

Therefore, putting away lying, let every man speak truthfully with his neighbor, for we are members of one another.|So den, unu fi tap tel lai. Mek aal a wi taak di chuut tu wi wan aneda, kaaz di choch komiin laik wan badi, an aal a wi a paat a it.
Be angry but do not sin. Do not let the sun go down on your anger.|Ef unu get beks bout sopm, no mek dat kaaz unu fi sin. An no mek di die don an unu stil beks wid wan aneda.
Do not give place to the devil.
column2: Unu no fi gi di devl no chaans niida. No mek im mek unu sin.

column1: Let him who steals steal no more. Instead, let him labor, working with his hands things which are good, that he may have something to share with him who is in need.|Aal uu did a tiif mos tap tiif. Wa dem fi du a wok aad fi wa dem waahn. Da wie de, dem wi av inof fi shier wid piipl we no av notn.

Let no unwholesome word proceed out of your mouth, but only that which is good for building up, that it may give grace to the listeners.|Unu fi tap chat doti chat. Taak gud sitn aal di taim. Da wie de, di sitn dem we unu se wi bil op di piipl dem we niid fi get bil op. An enibadi we ier we unu se wi nuo ou Gad lov dem iivn duo dem no dizorv it.

And do not grieve the Holy Spirit of God, in whom you are sealed for the day of redemption.|No du notn fi mek Gad Uoli Spirit afi baal. A im liv iina unu an put im speshal maak pan unu fi shuo se unu bilang tu Gad an se wan die Gad a-go frii unu kaaz a dat im siev unu fa.

Let all bitterness, wrath, anger, outbursts, and blasphemies, with all malice, be taken away from you.|Tap kyari beli fi unu wan aneda, an beks op beks op an a get mad wid unu wan aneda — tap it. Tap kos out an tier dong unu wan aneda an unu no fi wikid tu unu wan aneda niida.

And be kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, just as God in Christ also forgave you.|Unu fi kain an gud tu wan aneda. Unu no fi kip op wan aneda iina unu aat. Siem laik ou Gad paadn unu siek-a wa Jiizas Krais du, a siem so unu fi paadn unu wan aneda tu.
Therefore be imitators of God as beloved children.|So den, sins unu a Gad pikni an im lov unu, unu fi chrai fi tan jos laik im.

Walk in love, as Christ loved us and gave Himself for us as a fragrant offering and a sacrifice to God.|Lov unu wan aneda, jos laik ou Krais Jiizas lov unu. Im gi op im laif fi wi laik wan swiit sakrifais we dem bon pan alta gi Gad.

And do not let sexual immorality, or any impurity, or greed be named among you, as these are not proper among saints. |Unu a Gad speshal piipl. So non a unu no fi get miks op iina naasi laif laik: man a sliip wid uman we a no im waif, man a sliip wid man, ar uman wid uman. Unu no fi waahnti-waahnti niida. Dem de sitn de no fi de mongks Gad piipl at aal at aal.

Let there be no filthiness, nor foolish talking, nor coarse joking, which are not fitting. Instead, give thanks. |No yuuz doti wod, an no bada wid aigl, kielis an fuul-fuul taak, kaaz Gad piipl no du dem sitn de. Wa unu fi du a gi Gad tangks.

For this you know, that no sexually immoral or impure person, or one who is greedy, who is an idolater, has any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God.|Unu kyan nuo fi shuor se enibadi we sliip wid sumadi dem no marid tu, dem kyaahn tek paat iina di nais sitn dem we put op fi Gad piipl iina Faada Gad an Krais Jiizas kindom. Di siem ting go fi dem we du naasinis an dem we waahnti-waahnti (dem piipl de a worship faalz gad).

Let no one deceive you with empty words, for because of these things the wrath of God is coming upon the sons of disobedience.|Unu no fi mek nobadi chrik unu wid wod we no mek no sens. Gad beks wid piipl we taak dem sitn de, an im gweehn ponish aal a uu chat fuulinish an no du we im se.
Therefore do not be partakers with them.|So, no kip kompni wid dem de saat a piipl de, an no tek paat iina dem fuulinish.

For you were formerly darkness, but now you are light in the Lord. Walk as children of light|Wan taim, unu did a liv iina di daak laik piipl we no nuo Gad. Bot nou dat unu ton di Laad pikni, unu no iina daaknis agen, unu iina lait. So nou, unu mos liv laik piipl we de iina di lait
for the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth|(kaaz di sitn dem we kom fram di lait, a onggl wa gud, rait an chuu).
proving what is pleasing to the Lord.
column2: Chrai fain out we di Laad riili waahn unu fi du.

column1: And do not have fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness; instead, expose them. |Unu no fi tek paat iina di rang sitn dem we piipl we no nuo Gad an we a liv iina di daak a du. Wa unu fi du a mek evribadi si se di sitn dem we dem piipl de a du no mek no sens.
For it is shameful even to speak of those things which are done by them in secret. |Kaaz di sitn dem we dem a aid an a du, so naasi, piipl shiem fi taak bout dem.
But all things are exposed when they are revealed by the light, for everything that becomes visible is light.|Bot di lait shuo op aal a di sitn dem we iina di daak mek evribadi si.

Therefore He says:“Awake, you who sleep,arise from the dead,and Christ will give you light.”|Lait shuo op evriting an mek wi si wa dem riili komiin laik. A dat mek Gad wod se,“Unu we a sliip, wiek op, man.Aal a unu we ded, kom bak alaiv,an mek Krais Jiizas shain pan unu laka lait.”
See then that you walk carefully, not as fools, but as wise men|Wach ou unu liv. No gwaan laik unu a fuul. Ak laik se unu av sens.
making the most of the time because the days are evil.|Evri chaans unu get fi du sopm gud, du it, kaaz a bier wikid sitn a gwaan iina dem taim ya.
Therefore do not be unwise, but understand what the will of the Lord is.|So no bada gwaan laik unu chupid. Fain out we di Laad riili waahn unu fi du.

Do not be drunk with wine, for that is reckless living. But be filled with the Spirit. |No bada jringk chrang jringk an get jongk an galang bad an gwaan wid aal kain-a naasinis. Wa unu fi du a mek di Uoli Spirit tek kanchuol a unu laif.

Speak to one another in psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs, singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord.|Da wie de, wen unu a taak tu wan aneda, unu kyan yuuz saamz, sing som im, an sing di sang dem we di Spirit gi unu. Unu wi kyan sing an mek myuuzik bobl iina unu aat an priez di Laad.
Give thanks always for all things to God the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ
column2: Unu fi gi tangks tu Faada Gad aal di taim fi evriting. Unu fi gi im tangks siek-a wa di Laad Jiizas du fi unu.

column1: being submissive to one another in the fear of God.|Kaaz unu av nof rispek fi di Laad Jiizas, unu fi ombl unuself an lisn tu unu wan aneda.

Wives, be submissive to your own husbands as unto the Lord.|Di uman dem we av ozban mos ombl demself an du we dem ozban se dem fi du jos laik ou dem wuda ombl demself an du we Krais Jiizas se dem fi du.

For the husband is the head of the wife, just as Christ is the head and Savior of the church, which is His body.|Dem fi du dis kaaz di ozban a di ed a di waif siem laik ou Krais Jiizas a di ed fi di choch. Im a di wan we siev di choch, an di choch a fi im badi.

But as the church submits to Christ, so also let the wives be to their own husbands in everything.|Siem laik ou di piipl dem we mek op di choch ombl demself an du we Krais Jiizas se dem fi du, a siem so di uman dem fi ombl demself an du we dem ozban waahn dem fi du.
Husbands, love your wives, just as Christ also loved the church and gave Himself for it|Nou, di ozban dem fi lov dem waif siem laik ou Krais Jiizas lov di choch an ded pan di kraas fi it.

that He might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word|Jiizas gi op im laif pan di kraas, so dat im kuda mek di choch kliin an set ar wan said fi Gad. A di Gud Nyuuz we powaful dat im tek wash ar an mek ar kliin.

and that He might present to Himself a glorious church, not having spot, or wrinkle, or any such thing, but that it should be holy and without blemish.|Krais Jiizas du dis so im kuda gi op im choch tu imself laik wan gruup a piipl we luk wel gud — wan we no av no doti spat, no ringkl ringkl, ar notn laik dat, bot wan we gud an kliin an no av no faalt at aal.

In this way men ought to love their wives as their own bodies. He who loves his wife loves himself.|A siem so ozban fi lov dem waif, siem laik ou dem lov dem uona self. Di wie ou im lov im waif shuo se im lov imself.

For no one ever hated his own flesh, but nourishes and cherishes it, just as the Lord cares for the church. |Kaaz piipl no iet dem uona badi. Wa dem du a fiid an tek kier a demself, siem laik ou Krais luk aafa wi we mek op im choch.
For we are members of His body, of His flesh and of His bones. |Im du it, kaaz wi a paat a fi im badi.

“For this reason a man shall leave his father and mother and shall be joined to his wife, and the two shall be one flesh.”|“Siek-a dat wan man wi lef im mada an faada yaad an go marid tu im waif, an di tuu a dem tugeda a-go komiin laik wan sumadi.”

This is a great mystery, but I am speaking about Christ and the church. |It aad fi andastan we dem sitn ya miin. Matarafak, wa mi a taak buot ya-so nobadi neva nuo bout it bifuo. Bot Gad a mek wi nuo bout it nou. Mi a taak bout Krais Jiizas an im choch.

However, let each one of you love his wife as himself, and let the wife see that she respects her husband.|Bot rait nou stil, mi a tel di ozban dem se dem fi lov dem waif jos laik ou dem lov demself. An di waif dem fi rispek dem ozban.

Children, obey your parents in the Lord, for this is right. |Nou, az fi unu pikni, unu bilang tu di Laad, so unu fi du wa unu mada an faada tel unu fi du. Du it, kaaz a di rait sitn dat, an a dat Gad waahn unu fi du.

“Honor your father and mother,” which is the first commandment with a promise|It rait dong iina Gad wod se, “Rispek unu faada an unu mada.” (Da ruul ya, a di fos ruul fram Gad we av wan pramis tai tu it).
“so that it may be well with you and you may live long on the earth.”|Ef unu du dat, evriting a-go aarait wid unu an Gad wi mek unu liv api pan di ort fi wan lang lang taim.”

Fathers, do not provoke your children to anger, but bring them up in the discipline and instruction of the Lord.|Yu si aal a unu we a faada, no man-anggl, an bada bada unu pikni dem an mek dem beks. Wa unu fi du a tek kier a dem an tiich dem fi liv di wie ou di Laad waahn dem fi liv.

Servants, obey those who are your masters according to the flesh, with fear and trembling, in sincerity of your heart, as to Christ|Unu si unu we a sliev, unu fi rispek unu maasta an du we dem waahn unu fi du. Unu fi sorv dem wid aal a unu aat, siem laik ou unu wuda du we Krais Jiizas waahn unu fi du.

not serving when eyes are on you, but as pleasing men as the servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart|Unu fi du wa dem tel unu se unu fi du. Du it no onggl kaaz dem a wach unu an unu waahn dem fi tingk se unu a du gud. Bot du it kaaz unu a Krais Jiizas sliev, an unu nuo we Gad waahn unu fi du.

with good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men|Unu aat fi api wen unu a du unu wok, jos laik se unu a du it fi di Laad, no fi piipl. 8Memba se Gad gweehn pie evribadi fi we dem du, sliev ar no sliev.
knowing that whatever good thing any man does, he will receive the same from the Lord, whether he is enslaved or free.|Memba se Gad gweehn pie evribadi fi we dem du, sliev ar no sliev.

And masters, do the same things for them, no longer threatening, knowing that your Master also is in heaven, and there is no partiality with Him.|An aal a unu we av sliev, unu fi chriit unu sliev dem gud. Unu no fi chretn dem, kaa memba se unu an unu sliev av di siem maasta iina evn, an im no paashal wid nobadi.
Finally, my brothers, be strong in the Lord and in the power of His might. |Dis a di laas sitn we mi a se: unu an di Laad kluos, so mek im powa mek unu chrang.

Put on the whole armor of God that you may be able to stand against the schemes of the devil. |Siem laik ou suoja put aan dem speshal kluoz fi elp protek demself, a siem so unu fi put aan unu aami kluoz dem we Gad gi unu. Da wie de, unu kyan fait di devl wen im kom gens unu wid im wikid chrik dem.

For our fight is not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, and against spiritual forces of evil in the heavenly places.|Kaaz wi iina wan fait, bot a no naamal sumadi wi a fait gens. Nuo! Wi a fait gens som wikid spirit iina di skai we av di powa an di rait fi ruul iina da taim ya we daak laik nait.

Therefore take up the whole armor of God that you may be able to resist in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.|So unu fi put aan aal a unu aami kluoz dem we Gad gi unu fi protek unuself. Da wie de, enitaim di devl kom chrai fi wok im chrik pan unu, unu wi kyan tan op chrang gens im. Unu wi fait im til im no av no fait lef iina im. An wen unu don fait im, unu wi stil tan op chrang.

Stand therefore, having your waist girded with truth, having put on the breastplate of righteousness|Unu wi tan op chrang wen unu faasn di chuut roun unu laik wan belt roun unu wies, wen unu du di sitn dem we rait iina Gad yai dem kyan protek unu laik ou suoja aiyan ves protek dem ches.
having your feet fitted with the readiness of the gospel of peace
column2: Unu wi tan op chrang wen unu put aan di Gud Nyuuz we gi piipl piis iina dem aat siem laik ou unu put aan unu suoja shuuz pan unu fut dem.

column1: and above all, taking the shield of faith, with which you will be able to extinguish all the fiery arrows of the evil one.|An pan tap a aal a dat, mek wa unu biliiv protek unu siem laik ou suoja shiil out di faiya aro dem we dem enimi shuut aafa dem.

Take the helmet of salvation and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God.|An mek di fak se unu nuo se Gad siev unu, protek unu siem laik ou suoja elmit protek dem ed fram dem enimi. An uol aan tait pan di suod we di Uoli Spirit gi unu, dat a Gad wod.

Pray in the Spirit always with all kinds of prayer and supplication. To that end be alert with all perseverance and supplication for all the saints. |An evritaim unu a prie, mek di Uoli Spirit liid unu. An no mata wa, no tap aks Gad fi elp unu an aal a im piipl iina evriting. Nou dat unu nuo aal a dem sitn ya, wach out an kip unu yai dem waid uopm aal di taim.

Pray for me, that the power to speak may be given to me, that I may open my mouth boldly to make known the mystery of the gospel|Prie fi mi tu. Prie se Gad wi elp mi an tel mi di rait wod fi se. Prie se mi wi no fried evritaim mi uopm mi mout fi tel piipl di siikrit mesij bout di Gud Nyuuz

for which I am an ambassador in chains, that I may speak boldly as I ought to speak.|kaaz a dat Krais Jiizas pik mi an mek mi wan a im apasl fa. An a dat dem lak mi op iina prizn fa. So prie se mi wi priich di Gud Nyuuz di wie ou mi fi priich it an no fried a notn.

Now that you also may know my activities and how I am doing, Tychicus, a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord, will make everything known to you.|Taikikos mi gud gud breda an uu aalwiez a du di Laad wok, wi tel unu evriting bout mi so unu wi nuo ou mi a du.

I have sent him to you for this very purpose, that you might know our activities and that he might comfort your hearts.|A dat mi sen im tu unu fa, so unu wi nuo ou tingz a go wid wi, an so dat wa im tel unu wi elp mek unu api.

Peace be to the brothers, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.|Mi prie se Faada Gad an wi Laad Jiizas Krais wi elp aal a unu we chos iina im, fi liv iina piis an lov unu wan aneda.
Grace be with all those who love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity. Amen.|Yu si aal uu lov wi Laad Jiizas Krais, mi prie se unu wi si ou Gad lov unu, iivn duo wi no dizorv it.

Paul, an apostle (not from men nor through man, but through Jesus Christ and God the Father, who raised Him from the dead)|Da leta ya a kom fram mi, Paal, wan a Jiizas Krais apasl. A no wan gruup a piipl mek mi ton apasl an a no man gi mi da wok ya fi du niida. Bot a Jiizas Krais an Gad we mek im kom bak alaiv sen mi fi bi wan apasl.
and all the brothers who are with me,To the churches of Galatia:|A mi an di uol a di breda dem we de ya wid mi a rait da leta ya, an it a fi aal a di piipl dem we go di choch dem iina Gyaliesha.
Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ
column2: Mi prie se wi Faada Gad an wi Laad Jiizas Krais wi shuo unu lov iivn duo wi no dizorv it an gi unu piis iina unu aat.

column1: who gave Himself for our sins, that He might deliver us from this present evil age, according to the will of our God and Father|Jiizas gi op im laif fi siev wi fram wi sin dem an fi frii wi fram aal a di wikid sitn dem we a apm nou. A dat Faada Gad did waahn im fi du an so a dat im du.
to whom be glory forever and ever. Amen.
column2: Mi prie se di uol a wi wi priez Gad fi eva an eva! Iemen!

column1: I marvel that you are turning away so soon from Him who called you in the grace of Christ to a different gospel
column2: Mi fraitn fi si ou unu kwik fi ton we fram Gad we pik unu an we sen Jiizas fi bi gud an kain tu unu. Unu ton we fram di chuu mesij an staat fala som ada mesij.

column1: which is not a gospel. But there are some who trouble you and would pervert the gospel of Christ.
column2: Dem ada mesij de a no di chuu mesij — a onggl wan chuu mesij de bout. Bot yu av som piipl we a kanfyuuz unu an we waahn fi chienj op di chuu mesij bout Krais Jiizas.

column1: Although if we or an angel from heaven preach any other gospel to you than the one we have preached to you, let him be accursed.|Bot iivn ef a wan a wi ar wan ienjel fram outa evn kom an a priich sopm difrant fram di chuu mesij we wi did priich tu unu, mi prie se Gad wi fling im dong a el mek im sofa.

As we said before, so I say now again: If anyone preaches any other gospel to you than the one you have received, let him be accursed.|Mi se it bifuo an mi a se it agen, ef nobadi kom an priich sitn we no lain op wid di chuu mesij we unu did ier — mi prie se Gad wi fling im dong a el mek im sofa.

For am I now seeking the approval of men or of God? Or am I trying to please men? For if I were still trying to please men, I would not be the servant of Christ.|Nou, wen mi taak so, a uu unu tingk mi a chrai fi win uova, Gad ar man? A uu unu tingk mi a chrai fi mek api? Ef mi did stil a chrai fi mek piipl api wid mi, mi wudn bi wan sliev fi Krais Jiizas.

But I reveal to you, brothers, that the gospel which was preached by me is not according to man.|Breda an sista mi waahn unu fi nuo se di mesij we mi priich tu unu, a no notn we nobadi mek op an tel mi.

For I neither received it from man, neither was I taught it, except by a revelation of Jesus Christ.|Nobadi neva bring it kom gi mi ar tiich it tu mi. Di mesij we mi priich tu unu kom fram Gad an a Jiizas shuo it tu mi.

For you have heard of my former life in Judaism, how I persecuted the church of God beyond measure and tried to destroy it|Kaaz unu ier bout ou mi did stie wen mi did a worship Gad laik ou di Juu dem worship Gad. Unu ier bout ou mi yuus tu go roun an a mek Gad piipl sofa bad bad an a mash op dem choch.

and progressed in Judaism above many of my equals in my own heritage, being more exceedingly zealous for the traditions of my fathers.|Dem die de, mi did wie a'ed a di ada Juu dem we a did di siem iej laik mi. Kaaz mi did a fala di sitn dem we wi faada faada dem kom dong did tiich. An mi fala it muor dan di uol a dem.
But when it pleased God, who set me apart since I was in my mother’s womb and called me by His grace|Bot Gad gud an kain tu mi. Im pik mi fram mi baan an im kaal mi fi du im wok. An wen im did redi

to reveal His Son in me, that I might preach Him among the nations, I did not immediately confer with flesh and blood|im mek mi nuo im Bwai Pikni, Jiizas, so dat mi kuda tiich di piipl dem we a no Juu bout im. Mi neva go taak tu nobadi wen dem sitn de apm tu mi

nor did I go up to Jerusalem to those who were apostles before me. But I went into Arabia, and returned again to Damascus.|an mi neva go a Jeruusilem fi si dem we ton apasl bifuo mi. Di fos ting mi du a go a Ariebiya an afta dat mi go baka Damaskos.
After three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter and stayed with him for fifteen days.
column2: A chrii ier afta dat mi go a Jeruusilem go si Siifas an mi spen fiftiin die wid im.

column1: I saw none of the other apostles except James, the Lord’s brother. |Wen mi de de mi si Jiemz, di Laad breda, bot mi neva si non a di ada apasl dem.
In what I am writing to you, before God, I do not lie!|Gad a mi witnis. Aal a di sitn dem we mi rait tel unu a chuu sopm — mi naa tel unu no lai.
Then I went into the regions of Syria and Cilicia
column2: Mi lef fram Jeruusilem an go a Siriya an Silisiya.

column1: and was unknown by face to the churches of Judea which were in Christ.
column2: Bot di piipl we fala Jiizas an we go di choch dem iina Judiya neva nuo we mi luk laik.

column1: They had heard only, “He who persecuted us in times past now preaches the faith which he once destroyed.”|Dem did onggl ier bout mi. Dem ier se, “Paal, di wan we mek nof a Gad piipl sofa an we chrai mash op nof choch, chienj im wiez an ton roun nou a tiich di mesij bout Jiizas. Im staat du di siem sitn we im did a chrai fi tap.”
And they glorified God because of me.
column2: An dem priez Gad siek-a wa apm tu mi.

column1: Then after fourteen years I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas and also took Titus with me.
column2: Den afta fuotiin ier mi go baka Jeruusilem wid Baanabas. Mi did tek Taitos wid mi tu.

column1: I went up in response to a revelation and communicated to them the gospel which I preach among the Gentiles. But privately I communicated to those who were of reputation, in case I might be running, or had run, in vain.|Mi go bak de kaaz Gad did mek mi nuo se a de-so im waahn mi fi go. An wen mi dong de mi miit wid di liida dem — dem wan, an mek dem ier di mesij we mi did a priich tu di piipl dem we a no Juu. Mi mek dem ier it so dat dem wuda nuo se mi a tiich di chuut an so dat aal a di wok we mi did a du, wudn kom tu notn.
But even Titus, who was with me, though he was a Greek, was not compelled to be circumcised.|Nou Taitos did de de wid mi an im a wan Griik man — im a no Juu an dem neva fuos im fi get sorkomsaiz.

This happened because false brothers were secretly brought in, who sneaked in to spy out our liberty, which we have in Christ Jesus, that they might bring us into bondage.|Mi did taak tu di liida dem wan kaaz yu av som piipl we gwaan laik se dem a fala Gad an a siniik kom iin mongks Gad piipl, so dat dem kyan wach dem. Jiizas frii wi kaaz wi an im kluos. So dem a wach wi kaaz wi no afi fala di Juu dem Laa. Dem waahn wi fi fala da Laa de laik se wi a sliev.

We did not yield to subjection to them, not for an hour, that the truth of the gospel might continue with you.|Bot wi neva gi iin tu dem — no iivn fi a likl. Wi neva du wa dem waahn kaaz wi did waahn fi mek shuor se unu gwaan biliiv di chuu mesij bout Jiizas we wi did tiich unu.

But of these who seemed to be something—whatever they were, it makes no difference to me; God shows no partiality to anyone—for those who seemed to be something added nothing to me. |Di impuotant liida dem iina Jeruusilem (mi no bizniz wid ou impuotant di liida dem bi, kaaz Gad no luk pan dat, im no paashal) — dem neva ad notn tu di mesij we mi priich.

On the contrary, they saw that I was entrusted with the gospel to the uncircumcised, as the gospel to the circumcised was to Peter. |Dem neva ad notn kaaz dem si se a Gad gi mi da mesij ya fi priich tu di piipl dem we a no Juu. Gad gi mi jos laik ou im did gi di mesij tu Piita so im kuda tiich it tu di Juu dem.

For He who worked effectively in Peter for the apostleship to the circumcised worked effectively in me toward the Gentiles.|An jos laik ou a Gad pik Piita fi bi im apasl an gi im di powa fi priich tu di Juu dem, a siem wie im pik mi an gi mi di powa fi priich tu di piipl dem we a no Juu.

When James, Cephas, and John, who seemed to be pillars, understood the grace that was given to me, they gave to Barnabas and me the right hand of fellowship, that we should go to the Gentiles and they to the circumcised. |An wen di big impuotant liida dem — Jiemz, Siifas an Jan, si se a Gad gi mi da speshal wok ya fi du, dem shiek fi mi an Baanabas an. Dem shiek wi an fi shuo se wi a wan a dem an dat wi fi gwaan tiich di Gud Nyuuz tu di piipl dem we a no Juu, jos laik ou dem a priich it tu di Juu dem.
Only they requested that we should remember the poor, which I also was eager to do.|Di onggl ting dem aks wi fi du a memba di puo, an dat a di sed ting mi did wel waahn du.
But when Peter came to Antioch, I withstood him face to face, because he stood condemned.|Bot lieta wen Siifas did kom a Antiyak mi go gens im an tel im tu im fies se wa im did a du did rang.

Before certain men came from James, he ate with the Gentiles. But when they came, he withdrew and separated himself, fearing those who were of the circumcision. |Kaaz im yuus tu iit wid di piipl dem we a no Juu. Bot wen som man we Jiemz sen riich, im kwik taim bak we fram dem. Im tap iit wid dem kaaz im did fried a wa di Juu dem we fiil se yu afi sorkomsaiz wuda se bout im ef dem kech im a iit wid dem piipl de.

And the other Jews, likewise, joined together in hypocrisy with him, so that even Barnabas was carried away by their hypocrisy.|Den chuu im du dat im mek ada Juu we biliiv iina Gad staat du di siem ting. Aal Baanabas ton ipokrit tu.

But when I saw that they were not straightforward about the truth of the gospel, I said to Peter before them all, “If you, being a Jew, live like a Gentile and not like a Jew, why do you compel the Gentiles to live like Jews?”|Bot wen mi si se dem naa ak laik ou di Gud Nyuuz se wi fi ak, infronta evribadi mi se tu Siifas se, “Ef yu a wan Juu an a liv laik di piipl dem we a no Juu, ou yu tingk yu a-go get dem piipl de fi staat liv laik ou Juu liv?”
We are Jews by nature, and not Gentile sinners|Wi baan Juu, wi no komiin laik di piipl dem we a no Juu we wi kaal sina kaaz dem no fala Muoziz Laa.

yet we know that a man is not justified by the works of the law, but through faith in Jesus Christ. Even we have believed in Christ Jesus, so that we might be justified by faith in Christ, rather than by the works of the law. For by the works of the law no flesh shall be justified.|Bot wi nuo se no chuu sumadi a fala di Laa dat miin se tingz rait bitwiin dem an Gad. A onggl wen wi biliiv iina Jiizas Krais dat tingz kyan rait bitwiin wi an Gad. So iivn wi we a Juu, staat biliiv iina Jiizas Krais. Kaaz wi waahn fi mek tingz rait wid Gad an wi nuo se dat naa apm ef wi jos a fala Muoziz Laa.

If, while we seek to be justified by Christ, we ourselves also are found to be sinners, is Christ therefore the minister of sin? God forbid! |Nou ef wen taim wi a mek tingz rait wid Gad, som a di Juu dem se wi a sina chuu wi naa fala di Laa — unu tingk dat miin se Krais Jiizas a kaaz wi fi sin? Nuo sa!
For if I build again the things which I destroyed, I make myself a transgressor.|Bot ef mi go bak go bil di sed sitn dem we mi did tier dong wan taim, den mi a riili wan sina.

For through the law I am dead to the law, that I might live for God.|So azkaadn tu di Laa mi ded aredi — kaaz mi naa fala it no muor. Mi tap fala it so dat mi kuda liv mi laif fi sorv Gad. It komiin laik se mi did ded pan di kraas wid Krais Jiizas.

I have been crucified with Christ. It is no longer I who live, but Christ who lives in me. And the life I now live in the flesh, I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave Himself for me. |An a no mi a liv no muor bot a Krais Jiizas a liv iina mi. Nou mi liv kaaz mi chos iina Gad Bwai Pikni — di wan we lov mi an we ded fi mi.

I do not nullify the grace of God. For if righteousness comes by the law, then Christ died in vain.|Mi naa go ton mi bak pan Gad lov an ou kain im bi tu mi, kaaz ef sumadi kyan onggl mek tingz rait wid Gad ef im fala di Laa, den Krais Jiizas ded fi notn.
O foolish Galatians! Who has bewitched you that you should not obey the truth? Before your eyes Jesus Christ was clearly portrayed among you as crucified.
column2: Unu fuul-fuul Gyalieshan unu! A uu guzum unu? Mi tel unu klier klier tu unu fies ou Jiizas did ded pan di kraas.

column1: I want to learn only this from you: Did you receive the Spirit through the works of the law, or by hearing with faith?|So a wan ting mi waahn unu fi tel mi nou: Unu get di Spirit chuu unu fala di Laa ar kaaz unu biliiv wa unu did ier?
Are you so foolish? Having begun in the Spirit, are you now being perfected by the flesh?|A so unu fuul? Unu staat out a fala Gad Spirit an nou waahn go chrai fi don wid unu uona chrent?
Have you endured so many things for nothing, if indeed it was for nothing?|Aal a di sitn dem we unu go chuu — unu did a sofa fi notn? A kyaahn so it go!

Does God give you the Spirit and work miracles among you by the works of the law, or by hearing with faith? |Wa mek Gad gi unu im Spirit an wok mirikl mongks unu? Unu tingk im du it kaaz unu fala di Laa ar kaaz unu biliiv wa unu ier?

Even Abraham “believed God, and it was credited to him as righteousness.”|Luk pan Iebriyam, “Im did biliiv iina Gad. An kaaz im chos iina Gad, Gad si im az sumadi we du rait, an tingz did rait bitwiin im an Gad.”
Therefore know that those who are of faith are the sons of Abraham.
column2: So unu niid fi andastan se di wan dem we chos iina Gad laik Iebriyam — a dem a Iebriyam pikni.

column1: And the Scripture, foreseeing that God would justify the Gentiles by faith, preached the gospel in advance to Abraham, saying, “In you shall all the nations be blessed.”|Gad did av a plan fi mek tingz rait bitwiin im an di piipl dem we a no Juu. Ef dem biliiv iina im, im wuda siev dem an tek we dem sin. Dis a did di gud nyuuz we Gad tel Iebriyam fram wie bak wen an we rait dong iina Gad wod. Gad tel Iebriyam se, “Piipl fram aal difrant konchri a-go get bles siek-a wa yu du.”
